1.content:
About 6 years ago you had the wildest dream of your life after playing too much Sonic the Hedgehog on
your Sega Genesis. In your dream you actually MET Sonic the hedgehog and somehow, he KNEW about
your foot fetish! Every night since, you have had dreams similar to it, but not always quite the same, some
times you were shrunken down to the size of a quarter and made to lick the huge walls of flesh that were
presented to you. Other times, you were just a normal sized human slave to the hedgehog. You even
remember this one time with Espio the Chameleon and Vector the Crocodile forcing you to be their slave.
You remember it vividly, you also remember a whole bunch of typos too... and these crazy scenarios always
played out, but never fully felt like they were finished.

You remember these dreams so vividly, but two weeks ago, without warning, they stopped. Just like that.
You still could play out the scenarios in your head like it was just last night that you had those dreams,
but ever since, you've just had normal dreams. You don't think much of it now, but boy were they some good
dreams.

Today is a Saturday, the first day of summer! You're off on your own, just out of college, life is great! You think
back to the dreams you had and decide to pull an all-nighter of Sonic Genesis, for old times sake. The console
is a bit dusty because, well, recently you haven't had all that much time to play it and you think it's not going to work,
but you'd be wrong to think so. You plug in the Console to your television, and get the cartridge, and you look at it for
a second, thinking something was a bit off, quickly shrugging off the feeling, you put the cartridge in and the game starts up.

You sit down as the signature "SEGA" theme plays, but all of a sudden, the screen turns blue, shining blue light all over the room.
You think, "Ah the thing must've crapped out from being so old." As you reach to take your cartridge out, another bright light
flashes and you fall into unconsciousness. You wake up a couple hours later....

1111.content:
The figure that you see is none other than Sonic the Hedgehog.
At first you are shocked to see the hedgehog outside of your
video game console, but then the shock is replaced with awe that
you are going to meet your hero. As you start walking toward the
hedgehog, you realize something, you aren't wearing any shoes,
in fact, you aren't wearing anything! At first you feel a little
embarrassed by this, but you remember that sonic doesn't wear
any clothes except for his shoes so it wouldn't really matter to him.

You continue to make your way to Sonic and eventually he sees
you, stops, smiles and waits for you to catch up. You finally get to him
and begin to introduce yourself when he stops you and says, "I know
who you are, I was the one that brought you here." A little stunned by this
you ask, "Why?" "I think you know the reason." He says with a little smile
because you do know, you have been a fan of the hedgehog since you
played your first Sonic the Hedgehog game and have always been
completely enthused with the idea of going to Mobius and living with him.

"But then you know-" "That's right, I do know your fantasy of living here
with my friends and I, so I decided, why not?" You are completely ecstatic
by what you are hearing, not only is your idol allowing you to live with him
whenever you choose, but is completely real and 100%- *BEEP* *BEEP* *BEEP*
Your alarm is blaring in your ear and you open your eyes, You are completely
saddened to find out that what you just experience was only a dream.
"Oh well," you sighed, "Maybe I'll have the dream again." and you get up, get
dressed and ready for work.

All the way to work you can't help but think about the amazing dream you had
and wanted so much more of it, but you knew dreams were only that: Dreams.
Once you got into work, you went to your office and sat behind your desk,
wishing that it had been real, but you had to focus on the papers that needed to
be filled. Occasionally you would glance up looking through the glass walls, thinking
you had seen something out of the corner of your eye, smiled and waved to the girl
with pink and blue highlights in her hair but dismissed it as nothing. You continued
working until late in the evening after everyone had gone home, but then you heard
something from outside.

You got up, went to the door, opened it and listened, there was definitely someone
in there and you knew that it wasn't Jim the security guard as his shift didn't start for another
30 minutes and all he did was sit at the door to the room with the cubicles in it. You walk out
of your office and ask "Hello? Is someone there?" to which no one answered. You continue
into the room, looking in cubicle after cubicle when you notice, your clothes were no longer
on. "I must be dreaming." You say aloud to yourself, "Anyway, why would I even dream of
being here?" "Because this isn't a dream." a voice from behind says. You turn to face whoever it is
and sure enough, standing behind you is

As soon as you caught up with the figure in the distance, you were surprised to see it was none other than a much older, taller, and handsomer version of what looked like Miles Tails Prower. He also seemed to be focused on a blinking monitor he was holding in his hands, until he almost bumped until you of course, then he looked right into your eyes and stared intently into them, as if wondering who you were.


"Um...hi." You said, interrupting the silence and causing Tails to blink and shake his hear for a moment before looking back at you, while smiling.


"Hi there. Don't think I've seen you around here before. You wouldn't happen to be from another world would you?" As odd a question that was to ask, he was right on the money. You knew you had to be in Sonic's world if you were talking to Tails, so you nodded in response as Tails clasped his hands together, smiling once again. Only this time beaming as he said...


"Yes! I knew it! That mean's my inter-dimensional transporter experiment was a success! I've actuality found a way to send and recover things to and from other worlds! Oh the science board is going to be so impressed with me again. But really, why wouldn't they? I'm one of the smartest..." Tails kept going on and on about how smart he was and how others looked up to him for all he's done for society and everything. By the time he was done talking, you were finally able to get your own words in.


"Listen, I'm glad for you and all, but is there anyway for you to send me back to my own world?" Tails looked back at you, shocked at what he just heard you say.

"Alright. Thanks Tails." Tail's smiled for a brief moment saying...


"No Prob.....Huh?" Then Tails started looking at you strangely before saying...


"How did you know my name?"


.......Well shit.

113.content:
"Wow that was some game," you muse to yourself, starting to groggily open your eyes, "I guess I must have over-done it... wait a minute, where am I?" You think to yourself as you begin to take in your surroundings, you aren't in your room, in fact, you had no Idea what this place was. Looking around you see vials of liquid of various sizes and colors, beakers, burners, everything found in a standard laboratory, but something was off, you couldn't place it, but you felt like there was more than meets the eye to this place. You get up, your head pounding a tad, but you don't really notice it. You begin to explore the room, contraptions, gizmos and gadgets as well as pills of every shape and color, notebooks left open, you pause to read some of a journal entry, but it seems far too technical for you to comprehend without the owner of the book present. You also notice something else that's peculiar, there's orange fur everywhere... The guy (or girl) must own an orange pet of some sort, dog, cat, something of that nature. You take a further look around the lab, it's a pretty decent size and- wait... do you smell chili?

You allow the smell to carry you over to a table with a pot resting on a burner, it looks like the owner of the lab must've gotten a bit peckish, come to think of it, so were you... surely he wouldn't mind if you tasted a bit of the chili, right? You dip your finger into the stuff, it was pretty warm, not burning, but pretty warm. You raise your finger to your mouth to taste the chili and suddenly, YOUR MOUTH IS ON FIRE! Your tongue feels like it's shriveling up from the severe burning that it's getting, you then look at a note that says "Let extra hot chili cool, unbearable spice; in event that chili too hot, White beaker beside pot with nullifying agent." How considerate of this person to leave something to cool off your tongue with, but there were three white beakers!! You decide to risk it as the pain in your mouth was becoming too great, so you grab all three beakers and down them. Bad Decision.

The room spins and suddenly you feel as if you are free falling, all you can tell from what's going on is that you are heading for that pot of chili and you try to brace yourself against the table, but instead find that you are above the chili, shrunken and fall straight into it with a plop. You are disoriented and the chili is like a warm bath bordering on slightly hot, but you manage to swim to the surface. You try not to get anymore chili in your mouth, but you can't help it, there's just to much of it, fearing the worst you gulp a little bit of it down, and surprisingly, your mouth isn't on fire! It seems as if the neutralizing agent worked after all. You're treading "water" when you hear a slightly familiar voice say "Hurry up and get that chili ready, bud, I'm starving!" there's a response that comes from a much younger sounding voice that jars you when you hear the reply, "Okay Sonic!" There's no way that you could have heard that right? Sonic? The Hedgehog? He' was just a video game character for crying out loud!

Sure enough you see the gigantic muzzle of Miles "Tails" Prower high above the chili pot. "Mmmmm" His voice booms, "Smells good, Sonic! I think the chili is just right!" This sends you into a frenzy, you try your hardest and yell your loudest at the towering fox-boy but all his response is an involuntary twitch in his ear. You feel the pot being lifted like a giant elevator, and then carried into another room, "I think everyone is going to love my chilidogs for the cook-off Sonic!" Tails says with a great amount of joy, "Good deal bud, as long as I get first taste, you could come in any place and I would still go back for seconds, your chili is to die for." That last bit made you greatly uncomfortable...

About twenty minutes later you could hear voices, music, laughing and see the open sky, it was a clear blue day and nothing was going to halt this cook-off, unfortunately for you. Soon it was time, you hear "...and Tails has come up with this secret recipe in just the last few months?" A female voice asks, Sounding like Amy Rose, a male voice sounding like Knuckles the Echidna answers, "Yeah he said it was so hot, that he had to create a special drink to cool your mouth down." "Wow! I don't envy Shadow right about now." Shadow? Why Shadow? Isn't he supposed to hate all of this? Wait, did Amy say she didn't envy him for... eating... the... Chili. The moment had come, a shouting voice could be heard from a distance, "ALRIGHT CONTESTANTS, YOU MAY NOW BRING YOUR CHILI DOGS TO THE JUDGE'S BOOTH" you couldn't believe it, in one day your life had gone from playing video games and being relatively normal sized to being shrunken and about to die... Just great.

Soon a gigantic Ladle descended into the pot and as hard as you tried, you could not escape its range, again you were on an elevator ride from hell, in great smelling chili. You then fell onto an enormous hot dog on a plate that was carried to what you could assume as the "Judges Booth" where you first laid your eyes on him: Shadow the Hedgehog. Black and Red fur, Red eyes with dark pupils, with a white tuft of fur growing out of his chest, truly a magnificent sight to behold... that is, if you weren't about to be eaten. He stares down at the chili covered hot dog with slight disdain, "Remind me, why am I doing this again?" He asks, turning to the Blue hedgehog, whose mouth was practically watering at the sight of the hot dog, "Because, We need an impartial judge and who's more of a loner than you, buddy?" Shaking his head and grunting a bit, the black hedgehog mutters "whatever," as he reaches for your prison.

He takes it into his hands and smells it before deciding it was okay to eat and slowly opens his maw. You try to get up from your position, but swimming in that chili for half an hour killed your muscles, not to mention the free fall and everything leading up to this moment. You enter the dark cavern that is Shadow's mouth, warm breath washes over you. You are terrified for your life as the two rows of giant white pillars pierce through your vessel as if it were no more than tissue paper. You find new energy to jump off of the hotdog and onto his tongue, you feel its slippery surface beneath you, salivating, tasting and maneuvering to get every bit of flavor from the chewed up food. You then get mixed up in saliva and hotdog meat, trying to avoid the chompers as best you can. Good news, you make it through in one piece, bad news, Shadow is swallowing the chunks of hot dog and chili. You are forced to the back of Shadow's throat along with the meat, muscles contracting and expanding every which way, dragging you down, down, down, further and further until you end up on top of your old buddy, piece of hot dog, floating on a sea of stomach acid.

You are able to at least find some comfort in the fact that you are now in the belly of a video game character and are about to be digested right? You wait for a few moments and then...

1131.content:
*ThiCommission by 21Parrots, Sorry for the long delay*

You suddenly realize that the bit of hotdog is receding into the pool of stomach juices, it truly is a weird sight to see.. come to think of it, how are you able to be seeing this right now? Wouldn't it be pitch black? Either way, you don't care, you've resigned yourself to this fate, so you just wait for it, relaxing a little before you have to tread acids, you even are close your eyes and drift to sleep, floating comfortably on the hot dog. When you wake up you realize you are still floating, you look and sure enough your body is floating on top of the acid, it feels slimy, a gooier consistency than water, which makes it easier to stay on top of. Soon enough however you begin to notice that your skin is slowly starting to feel looser, which causes you some alarm, but it doesn't hurt oddly enough. You chuckle to yourself, make this is some dream and you'll wake up, fresh as a daisy and in one piece... you know in your heart of hearts this isn't true, but it does give you some hope.

Suddenly you realize something, your leg! It just floated to the top of the acid sea... you didn't even feel it. You look down in wonder as little by little you start to float in different directions, how gruesome, yet intriguing and never painful... Slowly however you start to sink, and your eyelids become droopier, heavier, you just want to fall asleep, you feel the acid envelope your head, funny, you don't even have to breathe anymore, just let yourself sink into the darkness, your last thought before you slip into unconsciousness is that you led a great life, you can also say that you were the first human to pass on in this way.

The End?

Some time later you wake up.

"What the hell?" You think to yourself, "I died, I know I did, I saw myself dissolve and everything, how am I still here? Is...is this the afterlife?" Everything around you is completely black, you feel as if you're floating in empty space. You try to look around but feel as if you're fixed in one spot. Slowly your senses begin to return to you.

First you are greeted with feeling, wherever you were, you were tightly compacted against a cottony blanket of some sort and something else that you couldn't really describe you felt as though you were one form, shapely yet shapeless, your arms and legs stretched above you, or were they below you? The next sense that returned was your taste, a salty, briny taste began to form, but where, you couldn't be certain... odd, it was as if you weren't using your mouth to taste anymore, but rather your whole body was able to taste at the same time, you also felt really sticky and wet... what the hell was going on? As you thought the question to yourself you began to realize that your sense of smell was beginning to return, a pungent yet pleasing, cheesy odor began to permeate your body, you tried to inhale more but found that that was impossible since you had nothing to smell with, however more of the smell began to wave over your intensely warm body.

The next sense to return was your hearing and what you heard was the muffled voice of Tails and Shadow, they sounded somewhat far away but very close. The pair was conversing about Tails' Chilidogs, Shadow accusing Tails of undercooking the chili, as he was having a slight stomach ache, but tails assured him that the chili was prepared very carefully, that the hotdogs must have been to blame, Shadow was unconvinced but let the fox off the hook with a warning, "Tails, I swear to mobius, if any part of that chili got me sick, you will not like what I have in store for you..." You could hear the tension in the air, but Tails swiftly dodged the threat as he turned Shadow's attention to another matter, one about his feet.

Your ears perked up, you always did have a fascination with the details of Sonic characters' feet and you wanted to know if you could get in on the action somehow, once you figured out where you were... "You said your feet were also aching?" the fox boy asked cautiously.

"Yes, I know you're not a podiatrist, but..."

"Oh don't worry about that" tails said, cutting off the black hedgehog, "I have read thousands of medical books cover to cover as well as mechanical studies... heh, I have to have my hobbies, right?"

Shadow didn't know what to make of that so he just grunted, "Well... take a look."

As soon as Shadow said "Take a look," your world was flipped upside down in more ways than one, light nearly blinded you, you physically were up ended and you figured out where you were all at the same time. Somehow, in some way, by some weird or cruel joke, you were staring up into the giant faces of Shadow the Hedgehog and Miles Prower, and scarily enough, the more you looked around, the more you got it, you weren't just close to Shadow, you had been transformed into his entire foot! If you had any way to, you would have screamed.

Tails' face got right next to you, you could swear you saw his nostrils flare and his eyes light up when he got close to you, but you couldn't be sure.

"Well Shadow, it does look like they're a bit swollen, have you been stung by anything recently?"

"No, the only thing out of the ordinary is this damn hot dog eating competition... What do you recommend I do... Tails?"

In all your years you never would have guessed that out of all the places you had been that this would have been where you ended up, actually hearing Shadow the hedgehog be civil to another person while you were somehow, as if by magic, turned into his foot.

"Well, Shadow, I think the best thing for you would be to take it easy, maybe stay off it for a few days, ice it? Do you mind if I collect a few samples and run some tests to see what's wrong?"

"Jeeze Tails its only a swollen foot, but fine, you're the doctor, of sorts, here..."

Faster than you or shadow could perceive, Tails had his equipment out and was swabbing your sweat and taking a few flakes, the sensation tickled you and Shadow actually let out a small giggle, to which Tails froze and he covered his mouth with his hand.

"Breathe one word and I swear fox..." Tails only could nod.

Shadow then proceeded to cover you back up with his shoe and his sock and wordlessly left Tails, you began to feel the Earth rise and fall rhythmically, your sensations of tasting, smelling and feeling are kicked into high gear as shadow begins to run, you start feeling warmer and warmer and sweatier and
sweatier, You are loving every second of it, you feel yourself starting to get aroused, unsure of how that is even possible, but you feel yourself starting to slowly inflate, something inside you building up, but you have no idea how to release, the shoe is starting to become tighter and then it happens... after you cant hold it anymore, the feeling shoots out of you and up through shadows' leg, it then causes him to slow down and stop, he takes you out of your prison and you see that you are in....

"Hey, no! You'll sleep on the floor in a minute, we only just met!" You look down at the floor and see his shoes, at this moment, the floor isn't such a bad place.
"Hey, uh, can you sleep on the opposite end of the bed please?" Tails asks abruptley "I wanna be alone tonight."

You sleep for roughly nine hours and awaken to Tails eating breakfast, toast, at your desk while working on his yellow portable device, the MP (Miles Prower) 3. "Hey you're awake." he says ecstatically.
"What are you doin' Tails?"
"I'm mm, trying to, use your computer in tandem with mine to do "gross hypertravel "chaos" theory" equations, then l can go home, you can come with if you like, as their'll be a little bang, and you might end up in a GUN prison, or whatever your equivilent is, for doing something undiscovered and making a chaos control possible.... Oh AND the electricity bill will be huge" he laughs to himself. You have no idea what he's talking about but whatever, Tails is so cute when being smart.

"... And another thing, VERY flattering art of me by the way" he says sarcastically.

Busted.
1223.title: Foxblocked

You realised the Fox wasn't even going to give you a choice, taking you with him to his home - and soon enough, you found yourself on a massive wooden floor, hearing some thooming footsteps next to you. Looking up, you realise what just happened, as Tails' gigantic body loomed over you. You were shrunk while you were teleported! But how much?
12233.title: Shrink, at Tails' home

choices: I'd love to hang out with you.
Let's go out and see Mobius.
122331.content:
You blink as the bright light clears from your eyes leaving your vision a bit spotty, but you can't mistake what you see. You definitely are no longer in your own home, you've been transported via Tails' device. You turn you head to see the large red and white sneakers that immediately give you a bit of a shock. You look at the side of the shoe and immediately realize that your height barely crests where leather meets rubber.The brainy boy, that now towers high above you like a skyscraper, is looking at his device with a mixture of pride and absolute glee.

         "I did it! I did it! I DID IT!!" The mobius-renowned twin appendages seem to wag happily, faster and faster until he begins to hover in the air with excitement, generating strong gusts of wind that nearly fling you across the room. Tails shouts, "I can't believe it, I successfully harnessed Chaos energy! The ramifications of this alone will help create new methods of transport, who knows what else can be discovered with-" The boy is cut short when he looks down and sees your little body, struggling to stand against the air current. He immediately drops to the ground with a hard thud, getting on his hands and knees to inspect you. "Wh-what... I don't understand. How is this possible? You were normal sized when we warped!"

         The fox seems a bit rattled by this new discovery and carefully picks you up, depositing you into the palm of his gloved hand. He gingerly uses a large finger to poke and prod you. Despite this being a dream come true, you feel a bit indignant of being looked at and manipulated like a little toy. "Easy, Easy!" you say. The fox gets a quizzical look across his face. With his free hand, he goes to the messy kitchen table, locating a notepad amongst a sea of parts and wires. You could be lost for hours or days if you accidentally fell in. The boy sets the grid-style notepad on a stable part of the mess, sets you on it and grabs a pencil and a ruler.

         A look of determination sets on his face and his tongue sticks out a bit. "Lie down please." You do as he asks and the pencil begins to move quickly. "Now on your side." You again follow his instructions as he measures you, scribbling down notes and equations. When he is finished, he sighs. "Always something new to figure out isn't there?" You look up at him and he pulls a chair over. He looks at you with his piercingly blue eyes, studying you. After a few moments of uneasy silence, you pipe up, "Um, so what do we do?" The boy blinks and shakes his head, a smile returning to his face. "Well, there are positives and negatives here. Positive: Your diminished size has altered the volume of your voice, but not to the point where it is impossible to hear you. You also are completely intact, there have been no mutations further than what I can only attribute to matter readjustment. Now is the sticky situation, You have been diminished to an inch tall, relative to your previous size and I have no idea why or how this has occurred."

         A moment passes. "So I'm stuck like this." You ask cautiously. The giant nods, his smile is sympathetic, but unwavering. "The bright side here is that A: You have now become my responsibility and B: I know that you're more than okay with that." He chuckles a bit. "But!" He hops up from his chair excitedly, "This presents a whole new range of options for us to explore and new theories to be tested. And, in the best way possible, you have become my new project." He smiles and picks you up again. "So, for the time being, what would you like to do? We have the rest of the day to ourselves." You think for a bit and say:

131.title: Tails

1311.content:
You didn't really care about the experiment but it was a good way to meet your favourite character, Sonic the hedgehog. So you decided to have Sonic run the experiment on you.
"Well I would like Sonic to do the experiment on me if you don't mind" You answered nervously.
"No problem little guy, infact Sonic might be the best choice for the experiment" Tails replied. He went over to another table which seemed to be miles away to you. For Tails however it were merly six steps. The young fox grabbed a phone and probably intended to call over Sonic. The excitement began to rise in your body, you would finally be able to meet your idol in flesh and blood. Now thinking about it you started to wonder why Sonic would be the best choice to do the experiment on you. Maybe it was a quiz to figure out if you truly are the biggest Sonic fan. But then again why would they bother with that at all? Your mind was flooded with thought and you were only able to break out of it as soon as Tails started to talk on the phone.
"Hey Sonic remember that experiment I was talking about all week? Our little friend choose you. So would you like to do..." before Tails could finish his sentence Sonic popped up behind him in a blink of an eye.
"Sure thing Tails, you knew I was excited for this too"
You couldn't believe it, your idol was so close yet so far for you to meet.
"So Tails where are you hiding him?" Sonic asked while tapping his foot on the ground impatiently.
"Right on that table over there. And do be careful Sonic, remember what happened to the last one" Tails replied in a hurry.
"Chill Tails, won't happen again."

You got nervous as you heard their conversation. "What were they talking about? Did they do this before with somebody else? And more importantly what happened to him?" You thought to yourself as the gigantic hedgehog approached you with footsteps that you were able to feel from your very spot. As Sonic came closer the sound of the steps increased greatly and started to scare you. Sonic had a big grin on his face which you weren't able to categorize as a good or a bad thing. But one thing was sure, he was glad to be here. It was hard to say the same thing about you. Sonic took one final step sending your entire body into the air with a loud thoom.
Sonic stood right infront of you and watched you carefully as you tried to stand up straight which wasn't an easy thing to do while the giant hedgehog stared at you with a joyful yet intimidating look. Especially because of his size. He could probably crush your entire body with the tip of his finger if he really wanted to.

"There you're little fella, I gotta say you sure look pretty excited yourself. Ready for the experiment?" Sonic boomed at you in a playful tone. He completely paralized you with his voice. Slowly opening your mouth you tried to reply to the giant but ended up stuttering in fear and excitement. "H-he-hello I-I a-am y-y-yo-your b-b-big-biggest f-fan". You were a bit embarrassed about your nervous behaviour toward Sonic.
"Is that so? Cause you actually look like the smallest fan to me" Sonic chuckled causing you to join into his laughing a bit.
"Just kidding little guy. I bet you're. But I'm just here for the experiment so you might wanna save your questions for later, alright?" He explained in a serious tone. After nodding your head he grabbed you with his titanic fingers and brought you closer to his face.
"No need to be scared, I'm pretty sure you will love this" he stated.
1311.title: Sonic

13111.content:
Your body was thrilling rapidly due to the events that occurred so far. Sonic was holding you between his giant fingers and he was about to start the experiment that they kept on mentioning. Sonic slowly moved you closer to the ground on which he was standing on. Looking down you noticed that Sonic took off his right shoe and had his naked foot on the floor. You started to panic as he placed you into his shoe without giving you any explanation. The inside of the shoe was hugh, it could easily be used as a stadium at your current size. The insole was pretty beaten with a large print of Sonic's foot. You could tell where exactly his foot would be if he inserted it into his shoe. The large footprint was stretching the floor further down with a more grayish color than the rest of the shoe. Just the idea of a foot so big sent shivers down your spine.

"Having fun in there? Hope you're not planing to sleep on my insole cause this is just the beginning" Sonic said looking down at you. Just looking at the godly hedgehog from your spot was scary. He could do anything with you right now and he most likely intended to. Suddenly you saw him moving his right leg into the air and placing his giant foot right above the opening of the shoe. Now you knew what was going to come and it made you panic inside.
"Get ready little fan, this is gonna be one hell of a ride that you won't forget very soon" Sonic said giggling with a large smirk on his face. His toes started to wiggle in joy as he kept looking at you. You started running to the tip of the shoe so you wouldn't end up underneath the blue gods sole. As you ran you quickly remembered that you were in the shoe of your speedy idol. All the details in his shoe just hinted that he was running alot. His foot completely 'marked' this shoe as his own. The beaten insole, the giant footprint, the ravaged walls of the shoe and the overall grayish color which usually means that a shoe has been in use for a significant amount of time just reminded you that your situation was far worse that you thought. Sonic could keep you at his giant foot and run into his future adventures with you being at his mercy all the time. But Sonic would never do that, would he?

"Heh heh think you can run away from my foot eh? We will see about that little fanboy. I'm the fastest thing alive, remember?" Sonic said in a laughing manner. His foot finally entered the shoe and boy was it big. You haven't even made it to a quarter of the shoe, yet you were already exhausted. Sonic on the other hand didn't even break a sweat from his action. He wiggled his toes on the insole sending shockwaves towards you. The blue giant was in total control of your situation.
"Hah guess you aren't so quick after all. But don't worry your favourite hero is here to help you" Sonic taunted as he lifted the opening part into the air causing you to slide into the tip of the shoe. You reached your goal but noticed that it was all for nothing as you looked at the toeprints. His toes would eventually have their way with you. The toeprints were larger than your house. He could probably fill each toeprint with atleast 100 copies of you. Just the idea of it was terrifying to you.

"Lets see how you handle my toes. They are happy to welcome you in their home" Sonic said with a taunting expression.
The titanic toes approached you while getting bigger and bigger. Soon his big toes steamrolled over you and you ended up underneath them. Sonic squezzed his big toe deeper into you while holding back his giggling.
The pressure of his big toe was intense. He knocked out every bit of air in your body and made it hard for you to breath. His big toe began to grind your body deeper into the insole as Sonic moved his big toe from the left to the right and back and forward. You laid there powerless as the giant blue teen had you nailed under his lowest body part. Sonic was clearly enjoying having such power over someone, especially with his ego. The pure fact that a teen hedgehog could fit the entire human population underneath his foot was ridicioules, yet here we had a gigantic blue hedgehog with super speed who could torture anybody just with his toes. As Sonic's big toe kept grinding on your weak body you tried to escape. All the struggle was useless, the smooth flesh of his big toe was sliding over your body giving you a hard time. Just as you stop resisting he stops all movement. The pressure however is still there.

Sonic wasn't done putting you into your place so he continued the tourment by tapping his big toe onto you. Now things got even heavier. The big toe had you at its mercy once again. But this time the pressure was stronger and unberable due to the constanted tapping. Sonic laughed while his big toe smashed you deeper and deeper into his insole. Every toe tap had enough power to knock out every little bit of energy out of you. You weren't able to escape because of the massive force of the toe. Furthermore it was the big toe of Sonic the hedgehog which was much faster than any other toe you would experience. The big toe went up and down, up and down for over a minute. His big toe went up one last time before smashing you one last time into the insole which actually caused you to moan in pain. You thought it was over but you were very mistaked. The blue god had much more on his mind so he proceeded to wiggle his toes while thinking about it. He chuckled while all his toes had their fun with you.

As he wiggled his digits you were unable to do anything. You just watched helplessly as dirt from his toe gabs fell onto you. As the toes dragged you into all different directions you moaned out in pain as the pressure was constantly changing. Now each toe did something differently. It was all the experience you had from the big toe combined and multiplied by 5. Up and down, left to right, back and forward. The blue titans toes were a torture device to someone of your size.

"Now that we are done with introducing lets see where we can go to. And don't worry my toes will keep you save, so be nice to them and don't bite. If you do they might get 'heavier' heh heh" The blue giant said as he tapped the shoe you were in. Just as you thought it couldn't get any worse you were proven wrong by your blue god himself. His entire foot was now going up and down causing even more pain than before. Sonic surely was a playful hedgehog which isn't good for someone of your size. You now grunted in pain instead of moaning. All the heavy weight was rapidly beating onto you. Luckly you were stuck underneath his toes so Sonics sole couldn't harm you... yet. All toes had the exact same movement now, which made your situation even worse. While the toes went up and down on your fragile body, your fear was stunning you from the inside. Nothing could improve your case right now, you just had to lay there and take whatever the godly hedgehog decided for you, even if it was death...

You couldn't escape so you had to survive the rest of the tourment to have a minor chance of escaping the blue blur. The thought that your idol was responsible for the worst beating of your life was still scary to you.

The titanic hedgehog god lifted the front part of his shoe while leaving his heel on the ground. He proceeded by wiggling his toes and moving his foot around playfully. This caused you to slide away from the toe section and aim for the heel. If he was going to put you under his heel you would be finished and you knew it. But luckly he brought his entire foot back onto the ground before you reached the heel. You were stuck under his sole. What is he going to do now...

"Aww I think you need a bit of motivation little guy. Don't worry my foot will make the first move for ya" Sonic said while pushing his titanic foot deeper into you. "Still not motivated hmm? Hold on let me help you some more heh heh" Sonic said lifting is left foot from the ground and chuckling at your current state. The soft flesh of his gigantic sole smeared you greatly into his insole. The sole slided smootly over your tiny body leaving back a lot of reeking sweat onto you. Sonic smiled down with his hands on his hips knowing that he was beating up a lower lifeform just with a single foot. The titanic hedgehog enjoyed having such domination over someone, especially with his trademark bodypart. "Don't wanna go rough on ya little guy but I will if I have to. Now be a good sport and do something to return the favour. You could hmm..." Sonic was trying to figure out something you could do for him. Once again he tapped his titanic blue foot onto you but this time you were stuck under the sole. You screamed as the blue ceiling was crushing you constantly and breaking even more bones in your body. Tears started coming out of your eyes as you realised that this could become your daily life now. Stuck under a foot of a massive hedgehog who would use you as a toy whenever he wanted to. The repeated movement of his giant foot going up and down over your shrunken body also blew some hot air towards you which smelled terrible. Each time his foot came down, you and your surrounding got wetter from the sweat dripping of his huge sole. Your skin wasn't just suffering from the permanent foot tapping but also from the disgusting sweat. The worst however were his bonebreaking actions. The blue god could probably crush your entire body just with a single toe. Maybe he would actually do it and end your suffering once and for all. Right now he simply wanted to have some fun with a bug at the mercy of his foot. Sonic pulled his foot up one last time and brought it down with incredible force breaking several bones in your body and causing you to cry like a baby.

"I know what you could do. Since you had so much fun and guidance from my toes it would be nice of you to repay them" Sonic giggled as he lifted his heel and shacked his foot making you slide back to the tip of the shoe. Your journey ended in one of his toeprints. It's much more wetter than you remembered. His toes were sweatier than any other of his bodyparts. Strangly you couldn't see his toes as you looked around in the shoe. A drop of sweat forced you to look right above you and there they were, being wiggled by the blue giant himself. As they began to play with your peeble sized body, the hedgehog started laughing with one hand on his hips and the other scratching his head. It didn't really take much effort to deal with a runt like you and Sonic knew that. His toes moved your body in various directions getting more sweat into your mouth, more stink into your nose and more pain into your body. His titanic toes finally slowed down bringing you between his big and second toe.

All of a sudden you remembered what happened earlier when you were in this position so you tried your best to crawl away. Unfortunatly the blue giant had crushed too many of your bones at this point and even drained your body out of every little bit of energy. It was impossible to do anything now, you would most likely be toelint in the future while being stuck between Sonics gigantic toes while he would run into his adventures. His toes approached you from both sides slowly getting attached to each other. It was like one of those pyramid traps where the spiked walls moved towards the target. Sonics enormous toes were much worse than that however. You stopped crawling from the gigantic toewalls and accepted your fate. As you were buried between the giant toes you started screaming as the squeezing began. The titanic hedgehog was once again crushing you between his big and second toe. Sonic smirked as he increased the pressure and felt your worthless body between his toes. Squeezing you between his toes wasn't enough for the blue god so he slowly rubbed his toes together bringing one toe up and the other one down. He continued doing this, examining your tiny form on his favourite way. He laughed while you were being squeezed between both toes and slide into various locations between the toewalls.

You screamed and cried as the tourment proceeded. The sweatyness of the toes enhanced the torture since it made the sliding easier and forced you to swallow the sweat. The sweat and the smell between his toes were extremly toxic now. If you wouldn't be crying from the pain your eyes would still produce tears due to the disgusting atmosphere itself. Sonic kept on sliding his toes towards each other while crossing his arms infront of his chest and grining down at you. The blue god was obviously proud of his work.

"Hmm you can't really do much in that miserable condition. Lets see if I can still get something out of you heh heh" Sonic chuckled as his toes rapidly loosen their grip on you and squeezed you back between them. He was aware of your terrible state, maybe he would finally bring it to an end. Right now the gigantic blue hedgehog teen had a decision to make. Either let you remain underneath his foot and being tourmented much more or squeeze his toes together and finish you off. Sonic smiled as he kept playing with you between his toes.
1311112.title: Playtime

13111121.content:
The toes released you from their tight grip and you landed back onto the insole. Sonics big toe slowly went up right above you and came down almost instantly crushing you some more. The oversized hedgehog began doing something completely unexpected and pulled his foot out of the shoe. While his foot was leaving the smelly prison you were dragged along with it under Sonics titanic big toe. Your body was smeared towards the large footprint making you feel the watery insole and sickening you some more with the soggy smelly surface as you were dragged along it. The blue titan lifted his entire foot off of you as it left the shoe. Light and fresh air was finally entering the shoe of the speedy god. You were exactly at the opening of the shoe but still deep in it. The gigantic footprint underneath you felt very hot. His heel must have really beaten onto it during your torture.

"You look even worse than I thought you would be. But that's nothing I can't handle" Sonic smiled as he pulled out a chaos emerald and placed it above you. Everything started to shine and blend you, your hands covered your eyes and you turned your head turned away from the lightsource. Suddenly you realised that your bones weren't broken anymore, you even felt much better on a mental level. Did Sonic just heal your wounds? Maybe he isn't so evil after all.

"There you go, all fixed and cleaned little guy" Sonic said in an amused tone.

"Let me out of here Sonic, this isn't funny" you shouted at the giant hedgehog while jumping up and done and waving your hands. Sonics smile grew bigger as he saw your reaction towards his experiment, he clearly wasn't going to stop now.

"You monster I can't believe you would do such a thing. That's why your mother abandoned you. She saw you for what you are, a sadistic monster" you shouted up again as your blood boiled. Sonic didn't take your insult very well, you could tell by just looking at his face. Maybe insulting him wasn't the best idea especially at your current size. He could smack you with no effort and make you pay for your dirty mouth. The blue god stared at you with anger and you slowly felt the biggest fear so far. During all this time Sonic was holding back on you due to his positive attitude, but now you gave him a perfect reason to tourment you. You figured an apology to the blue giant would be the correct thing to do now.
But before you could even open your mouth he cut you off.

"You little runt! My mother loved me. She gave me away to protect me. I'm just trying to help Tails with his experiment here. How dare you talk like that to me. I save people every day. I'm not gonna take that from a wannabe fanboy. You will pay for what you just said" Sonic said in anger with both hands turned into fists. A line has definetly been crossed here. The gigantic blue blur inserted his foot back into the shoe while you begged for mercy. His foot felt much heavier than before, he was absolutely applying more pressure onto you.

"Yeah keep begging bug. You can consider yourself lucky if I let you live." Sonic said in an mischief tone while bringing you back into the toe section with his titanic blue toes. You were dragged across the wet insole once again but this time his toes pushed you harder into it and brought more sweat onto your tiny body. It also went much faster than last time. The blue teen had you pinned in the toe section and wanted to give you a hard time now. He crossed both of his arms infront of his chest as he wiggled his toes violently on you. Each time the gigantic blue hedgehog squeezed you with his titanic blue toes he bursted out a loud but short chuckle. As the smirk on his face grew you were getting much more pain into your body. Sonic now intentionally caused you pain with his colossal toes without showing any mercy. His blue toes constantly smashed you down with incredible speed. As the blue digits crushed your tiny form with every movement you began to scream. The 5 blue bullies went into all different directions making sure that everything in their surrounding was destroyed. The blue titan who controlled your tourmenters laughed as he heard your screams of agony.

"Heh heh is the little bugboy overwhelmed by my toes?" Sonic said sarcastically. He really wanted to put more salt into your wounds. His toes suddenly all came down on you causing intense pain and even a loud booming sound.

Thoom

"No rest for you bug" Sonic brought his toes up into the air and brought them back onto you with more force.

Thoom

"Come on beg me to stop and I might consider it" You laid under his massive toes crying about your current situation.

Thoom

"Don't wanna beg? I will make you, don't worry bug." The blue flesh went back into the air but this time his foot was balanced on his heel as he lifted his foot. His toes came down stronger onto you almost breaking your bones.

Thoom

"I have all day runt. But you clearly don't heh heh" His titanic toes went up with his entire naked foot and stomped you back into the toeprints.

Thoom

"What's wrong? I thought you liked to insult me. Are you playing mute so I give ya a break? Too bad" His enormous blue foot went back up and crushed you again which made you scream.

Thoom

"Are you screaming for more? Well I can't say no to a fan" The blue stinky flesh stomped you again bringing tears out of your eyes.

Thoom

"Hmmm I love fan service heh heh"
You cried as the titanic foot went back up and crushed you with his sweaty toes.

Thoom

"Are you pleased yet? No? Fine one more just for you" The strongest stomp of the blue titanic hedgehog yet which broke several bones in your body

Thoom

"Did I break something? Chill I can patch you up" Sonic said joyfully. His blue gigantic toes balanced all the hedgehog's weight now. The pressure increased and so did the pain. Sweat covered you once again and you paniced. He laughed as he heard your screams.
13111121.title: Live

1313.content: Suddenly you hear and feel shockwaves coming from behind you. As you turn around you see...
1313.title: Other

13131.content:
Manic the hedgehog, Sonics little brother and definetly one of the coolest characters in the franchise. As he came closer to you, the shockwaves of his feet touching the ground get louder. Even the power increased, sending your whole body flying into the air a bit more with each gigantic footstep he took. He didn't even notice you yet he gave you a pretty massive first impression. His walking went on until he came to an halt right infront of Tails and sending your entire body into the air and causing you to fall onto your back. The colossal green hedgehog was now looking down at Tails with a big smile on his face. Manic was two heads taller than Tails and much more intimidating. The shockwaves he caused a few seconds ago were intimidating enough but just looking at the giant hedgehog from upclose especially from your tiny point of view was extremly thrilling.

"What's up Tails? Still working on that experiment?" Manic asked with his thundering voice.

"Yeah, he was just about to pick his experimenter" Tails replied while pointing at you. Manic looked right at you with a curious look on his face. Your fear grew as the titanic hedgehog was casting a large shadow over you and giving his full attention. Suddenly he picked you up with two gloved finger and brought you closer to his face. His eyes scanned your body while you remained frozen due to fear.

"There's no reason to be afraid lil dude, I'm a not gonna crush ya like those evil giants" Manic said in a rather mocking tone. He most likely noticed your fear and tried to calm you down, even though his current action was contributing towards your anxiety.

"Tell ya what, how about we go for a lil walk? Might helps to thaw off your body, hmm?" Manic offered calmly with a grin on his face. You slowly nodded your head to accept his offer since your mouth was still stunned.

"Man you really are a scaredy cat. But don't ya worry, your buddy Manic has the best cure for that." Manic said as he dangled you in the air a little. He was really trying to help you but his mocking tone suggested that he was actually enjoying this.

"Manic you can't take him for a walk, he hasn't picked his experimenter yet" Tails stated.

"Didn't ya see him nodding his head? He accepted my offer, so that makes me the experimenter, right?" Manic replied in a persuading manner. It seems like the giant hedgehog outsmarted Tails by leading you into his trap. You would like to explain that you didn't want Manic as your experimenter but you were too scared of him as you hanged down between his large fingers. Tails was your only hope right now, he had to stand up to the green giant and get you out of this.

"Unless you want me to unshrink the lil dude..." Manic said sarcasticly as he looked down into Tails eyes. So he was the one who shrinked you down to this size. It was weird to see Tails being tricked so easily by someone, then again Tails was younger and more naive. So obviously Manic wouldn't struggle to put him into his place when he wanted to. He really wanted to be the experimenter so badly, going so far to threaten Tails to unshrink you and making this experiment impossible to do.

"No no okay okay fine you can do it Manic but please be gentle to him." Tails bursted out quickly with disappointment as he left the room. Manic looked back at you with a victorious smirk on his face, putting Tails into his place would probably be the second best thing that the green hedgehog would do today. However, the giant hedgehog was finally satisfied to be in charge of you, the excitement was easy to see in his face. You on the other hand still felt unsure about this with the remaining fear in your body.

"What's wrong bug? Scared? Heh heh" Manic intimidated with a mischief tone. You came to the realisation that Manic had nothing good on his mind for you.
13131.title: Manic

131311.content:
Your body was thrilling rapidly due to the events that occurred so far. Manic was holding you between his giant fingers and he was about to start the experiment that they kept on mentioning. Manic slowly moved you closer to the ground on which he was standing on. Looking down you noticed that Manic took off his right shoe and had his naked foot on the floor. You started to panic as he placed you into his shoe without giving you any explanation. The inside of the shoe was huge, it could easily be used as a stadium at your current size. The insole was pretty beaten with a large print of Manic's foot. You could tell where exactly his foot would be if he inserted it into his shoe. The large footprint was stretching the floor further down with a more grayish color than the rest of the shoe. Just the idea of a foot so big sent shivers down your spine.

"Aww you look so cute down there, hard to believe you're actually taller than me. But those days are over pal, time for some fun" Manic taunted looking down at you. Just looking at the godly hedgehog from your spot was scary. He could do anything with you right now and he most likely intended to. Suddenly you saw him moving his right leg into the air and placing his giant foot right above the opening of the shoe. Now you knew what was going to come and it made you panic inside.

"Get ready bugboy, this is gonna be one hell of a ride that you won't forget very soon" Manic said giggling with a large smirk on his face. His toes started to wiggle in joy as he kept looking at you. You started running to the tip of the shoe so you wouldn't end up underneath the green gods sole. As you ran you quickly remembered that you were in the shoe of Manic the hedgehog. All the details in his shoe just hinted that he was a daredevil. His foot completely 'marked' this shoe as his own. The beaten insole, the giant footprint, the ravaged walls of the shoe and the overall grayish color which usually means that a shoe has been in use for a significant amount of time just reminded you that your situation was far worse that you thought. Manic could keep you at his giant foot and go into his future adventures with you being at his mercy all the time. But Manic would never do that, would he?

"Heh heh think you can run away from my foot eh? We will see about that runt. Watch out he is coming to get ya" Manic said in a laughing manner. His foot finally entered the shoe and boy was it big. You haven't even made it to a quarter of the shoe yet you were already exhausted. Manic on the other hand didn't even break a sweat from his action. He wiggled his toes on the insole sending shockwaves towards you. The green giant was in total control of your situation.

"What? That's it? I'm kinda disappointed lil dude, thought for sure you had more in ya. Guess I'm gonna need to give you a little headstart then" Manic taunted as he lifted the opening part into the air causing you to slide into the tip of the shoe. You reached your goal but noticed that it was all for nothing as you looked at the toeprints. His toes would eventually have their way with you. The toeprints were larger than your house. He could probably fill each toeprint with atleast 100 copies of you. Just the idea of it was terrifying to you.

"Alright playtime is finally on. Lets see how you handle my toes. They are glad to have some company" Manic said with a taunting expression.
The titanic toes approached you while getting bigger and bigger. Soon his big toes steamrolled over you and you ended up underneath them. Manic squezzed his big toe deeper into you while holding back his giggling. The pressure of his big toe was intense. He knocked out every bit of air in your body and made it hard for you to breath. His big toe began to grind your body deeper into the insole as Manic moved his big toe from the left to the right and back and forward. You laid there powerless as the giant green teen had you nailed under his lowest body part. Manic was clearly enjoying having such power over someone, especially with his ego. The pure fact that a teen hedgehog could fit the entire human population underneath his foot was ridicioules, yet here we had a gigantic green hedgehog who could torture anybody just with his toes. As Manic's big toe kept grinding on your weak body you tried to escape. All the struggle was useless, the smooth flesh of his big toe was sliding over your body giving you a hard time. Just as you stop resisting he stops all movement. The pressure however is still there. Manic wasn't done putting you into your place so he continued the tourment by tapping his big toe onto you. Now things got even heavier. The big toe had you at its mercy once again. But this time the pressure was stronger and unberable due to the constanted tapping. Manic laughed while his big toe smashed you deeper and deeper into his insole. Every toe tap had enough power to knock out every little bit of energy out of you. You weren't able to escape because of the massive force of the toe. Furthermore it was the big toe of a master thief which was much more flexible than any other toe you would experience. The big toe went up and down, up and down for over a minute. His big toe went up one last time before smashing you one last time into the insole which actually caused you to moan in pain. You thought it was over but you were very mistaked. The green god had much more on his mind so he proceeded to wiggle his toes while thinking about it. He chuckled while all his toes had their fun with you. As he wiggled his digits you were unable to do anything. You just watched helplessly as dirt from his toe gabs fell onto you. As the toes dragged you into all different directions you moaned out in pain as the pressure was constantly changing. Now each toe did something differently. It was all the experience you had from the big toe combined and multiplied by 5. Up and down, left to right, back and forward. The green titans toes were a torture device to someone of your size.

"Now that we are done with introducing lets see where we can go to. And don't worry my toes will keep ya save, so be nice to them and don't bite. If you do they might get 'heavier' heh heh" The green giant said as he tapped the shoe you were in. Just as you thought it couldn't get any worse you were proven wrong by your green god himself. His entire foot was now going up and down causing even more pain than before. Manic surely was a playful hedgehog which isn't good for someone of your size. You now grunted in pain instead of moaning. All the heavy weight was rapidly beating onto you. Luckly you were stuck underneath his toes so the Manics sole couldn't harm you... yet. All toes had the exact same movement now, which made your situation even worse. While the toes went up and down on your fragile body, your fear was stunning you from the inside. Nothing could improve your case right now, you just had to lay there and take whatever the godly hedgehog decided for you, even if it was death...
131311.title: The experiment

1313111.content:
The enormous toes were still flattenting you underneath them while they went up and down. You couldn't even breathe anymore. Manic was still thinking about the locations he could travel to with you under his colossal foot. He probably took more time to think so he could smash you even more into his toeprints. You could hear him humming to himself calmly while you were getting the beating of your life. Manic was worse than any bully you have encountered in your life although he was a nice guy. He would have been one of the last persons you would have considered a bully. Still here he was trampling your body with his titanic foot. As his humming got louder the pressure of his toes increased. Not only was the oxygen low in his shoe but he actually had a bone-dry insole which seemed strange now that you thought about it. This is Manics shoe which has been in walked through sewers for years and even used in combat. So where is all the sweat that would have pilled up at the green gods foot? He most likely showered recently. The fact that the shoe nor his foot was smelly supported that hypothesis.

"Hope my toes warmed ya up a bit for our little walk. We are gonna have a nice hot day ahead of us" Manic said as he started to walk. Now the real torture began. Even though he was walking, it still felt like he was running. The pressure was unbearable now. Once again his lower body part went up and down on you but this time with the combined force of his entire body. You wouldn't survive this. You were a bug at the green thieves foot and he would eventually turn you into a red stain at the bottom of his sole.

"Hey you're pretty good at this lil bug. Guess being a foot mat is a common thing for ya hmm?" Manic said as he started laughing.
You started to scream out in pain as the toes landed on you. But your scream was constantly interrupted by the toes smashing down onto you. The toe flesh actually made it into your mouth which caused you to lick and even slurp it. The hot weather started to make his foot sweat which started to fill up the whole shoe making everything soggy and smelly. His foot was now offically assaulting all your senses. The sweat of his toes dropped onto you which made you choke and spit which was hard to keep up since you were still screaming from the constant pain. His toes were like wet towels beating onto you. It was getting worse and worse. The pain, the smell, the wet condition. It almost felt like a tropical island.

"Heh heh look my foot is offering you something to drink. Don't be shy, you can lick it off if you want" Manic chuckled as his smile grew bigger with each footstep he took.
Everyone in the outside world would see a green hedgehog walking innocently through Mobius. His hands behind his back, his eyes looking around in the sky and his cute face showing a heartwarming smile. But in reality this 'innocent' hedgehog was tourmenting you underneath his foot and had fun doing so.

You were tourmented like this for the next few hours. Manic decided to have some mercy on your soul and slow down. As he stopped you started inhaling heavily to get some air which was still hardly aquired in your current surrounding. Like the playful hedgehog he is he stretched his foot and toes playfully causing you to slide between the big and second toe which he then rubbed together with you inbetween them. "Not bad lil fella, you are still intact. I bet it's was one hell of a ride eh?". Manic kept on grinding you between his toes. There was even more sweat between his toes and it even smelled worse than anywhere else in the shoe. The gigantic walls were crushing you with no real effort. You still couldn't believe that Manic was such a monster. It must have been his rough childhood, he never had real parents to watch over him or to love him. He was a lone wolf guided by criminals. Of course he wouldn't feel any empathy for an insignificant lifeform like you. Behind that cute face he was still a playful child who hasn't outlived his childhood so he used you to do so.

"Wish we could do this everyday lil dude. Not sure if you had fun or not but atleast you're still okay. Don't ya worry, you made it so far without a scratch on your body, I'm sure you will be fine" Manic said in a sarcastic tone. He actually thought you were okay even after all that screaming you had been doing inside his shoe. Maybe he didn't hear it or maybe he was ignoring it so he could have his way with you. Your condition isn't important to him at all. The green giant merly wanted a toy on his foot. That's what the whole experiment was all about. You couldn't escape so you had to survive the rest of the tourment to have a minor chance of escaping the green titan. The thought that this good natured hedgehog teen was responsible for the worst beating of your life was still scary to you.

The titanic hedgehog god lifted the front part of his shoe while leaving his heel on the ground. He proceeded by wiggling his toes and moving his foot around playfully. This caused you to slide away from the toe section and aim for the heel. If he was going to put you under his heel you would be finished and you knew it. But luckly he brought his entire foot back onto the ground before you reached the heel. You were stuck under his sole. What is he going to do now...
1313111.title: Take off

13131112.content:
As you laid completely buried under his naked sole you felt the need to give it a touch. Movement seemed impossible under the massive foot of the giant hedgehog. Yet you managed to use both hands to inspect his green sole. It was surprisingly soft and even felt good in your hands. You couldn't get yourself to stop rubbing his godly sole, it was just too perfect. Strange that his foot wasn't rough at all, considering all the criminal work he did up to this point, his colossal foot constantly beating onto the same insole as he did all kind of jobs for the thieves guild. Giving it a second thought it made sense for him to have such soft soles considering all the sneaking he would do while walking on his tiptoes giving the rest of his foot some refreshment as he would balance his entire weight onto his toes. You weren't the only one who enjoyed this moment as you heard the titanic hedgehog moan in delight as you kept toching his sole almost massaging it.

"I knew you would enjoy this too lil bug. Come on you can do better than that. Show your tour guide some appreciaten " Manic said in a joyful tone while wiggling his toes. You didn't want to worship him after all the torture he put you through so you brought your hands back onto the insole of the giant shoe.
"Aww I think you need a bit of motivation little guy. Don't worry my foot will make the first move for ya" Manic said while pushing his titanic foot deeper into you. His gigantic sole became unbearably heavy now. You could hardly breathe while the green wall was pushing you deeper and deeper into the insole. The pressure stopped increasing for a moment letting you think that Manic had applied his entire body weight onto you. You found yourself panicing and screaming once again as the green sole squeezed you.

"Still not motivated hmm? Hold on let me help ya some more heh heh" Manic said lifting is left foot from the ground and chuckling at your current state. The pressure on the right foot was too strong now which slowly started to smash your bones. The green god wasn't done however. The heel of his right foot began to lift into the air aswell. Some of your bones started to break underneath the full weighted sole. While you screamed in pain The titanic hedgehog was laughing louder and louder. You couldn't even move a single finger at this point. Manic would end your pathetic life very soon and there was nothing you could do about it.

"You're a tough one lil kid. But I got all day so you better think twice before rejecting my friendly request" Manic said while rotating his right foot. The soft flesh of his gigantic sole smeared you greatly into his insole. The sole slided smootly over your tiny body leaving back a lot of reeking sweat onto you. His enormous foot went left and right grinding your already broken bones a bit more. It even went back and forward several times enhancing the pain and leaving your body with bright red skin. The sweat was pilling up and you had to force yourself to swallow it. It was disgusting yet very unusual from what you had ever tasted in your life. The green hedgehogs feet had their own unique smell. His large foot kept grinding you while you were about to faint. Fainting could have made your situation much more bearable but unfortunatly the pain was keeping you away from passing out. Manic smiled down with his hands on his hips knowing that he was beating up a lower lifeform just with a single foot. The titanic hedgehog enjoyed having such domination over someone, especially with his naked foot. Eventually with a bit of mercy left in him he stops grinding his foot onto you and even lifts his foot a bit giving you a big relief.

"Don't wanna go rough on ya lil guy but I will if I have to. Let me think what your small body can do for my foot . You could hmm..." Manic was trying to figure out something you could do for him. Once again he tapped his titanic green foot onto you but this time you were stuck under the sole. You screamed as the green ceiling was crushing you constantly and breaking even more bones in your body. Tears started coming out of your eyes as you realised that this could become your daily life now. Stuck under a foot of a massive hedgehog who would use you as a toy whenever he wanted to. The repeated movement of his giant foot going up and down over your shrunken body also blew some hot air towards you which smelled terrible. Each time his foot came down, you and your surrounding got wetter from the sweat dripping of his huge sole. Your skin wasn't just suffering from the permanent foot tapping but also from the disgusting sweat. The worst however were his bonebreaking actions. The green god could probably crush your entire body just with a single toe. Maybe he would actually do it and end your suffering once and for all. Right now he simply wanted to have some fun with a bug at the mercy of his foot. Manic pulled his naked foot up one last time and brought it down with incredible force breaking several bones in your body and causing you to cry like a baby.

"I know what you could do. Since you had so much fun and guidance from my toes it would be nice of you to repay them" Manic giggled as he lifted his heel and shacked his foot making you slide back to the tip of the shoe. Your journey ended in one of his toeprints. It's much more wetter than you remembered. His toes were sweatier than any other of his bodyparts. Strangly you couldn't see his toes as you looked around in the shoe. A drop of sweat forced you to look right above you and there they were, being wiggled by the green giant himself. As they began to play with your peeble sized body, the hedgehog started laughing with one hand on his hips and the other scratching his head. It didn't really take much effort to deal with a runt like you and Manic knew that. His toes moved your body in various directions getting more sweat into your mouth, more stink into your nose and more pain into your body. His titanic toes finally slowed down bringing you between his big and second toe.

All of a sudden you remembered what happened earlier when you were in this position so you tried your best to crawl away. Unfortunatly the green giant had crushed too many of your bones at this point and even drained your body out of every little bit of energy. It was impossible to do anything now, you would most likely be toelint in the future while being stuck between Manics gigantic toes while he would head into his adventures. His toes approached you from both sides slowly getting attached to each other. It was like one of those pyramid traps where the spiked walls moved towards the target. Manics enormous toes were much worse than that however. You stopped crawling from the gigantic toewalls and accepted your fate. As you were buried between the giant toes you started screaming as the squeezing began. The titanic hedgehog was once again crushing you between his big and second toe. Manic smirked as he increased the pressure and felt your worthless body between his toes. Squeezing you between his toes wasn't enough for the green god so he slowly rubbed his toes together bringing one toe up and the other one down. He continued doing this, examining your tiny form on his favourite way. He laughed while you were being squeezed between both toes and slide into various locations between the toewalls.

You screamed and cried as the tourment proceeded. The sweatyness of the toes enhanced the torture since it made the sliding easier and forced you to swallow the sweat. The sweat and the smell between his toes were extremly toxic now. If you wouldn't be crying from the pain your eyes would still produce tears due to the disgusting atmosphere itself. Manic kept on sliding his toes towards each other while crossing his arms infront of his chest and grining down at you. The green god was obviously proud of his work.

"Hmm you can't really do much in that miserable condition. Lets see if I can still get something out of ya heh heh" Manic chuckled as his toes rapidly loosen their grip on you and squeezed you back between them. He was aware of your terrible state, maybe he would finally bring it to an end. Right now the gigantic green hedgehog teen had a decision to make. Either let you remain underneath his foot and be tourmented much more or squeeze his toes together and finish you off. Manic smiled as he kept playing with you between his toes.
13131112.title: Reader's choice

choices: Do what you do best, indulge in Sonic's footy goodness
132.content:
You don't remember what happened, you just remember a flash and blacking out.
As you come to you immediately realize that your floor is a lot softer than you
remember and now come to think of it, warmer, a lot warmer... Hey! It's the middle of
summer and you had the air conditioner running on full blast.

You slowly open your eyes and notice that the ground is entirely white.

"Where am I?" You think to yourself. Your question is immediately answered by
"OH GOOD, YOU'RE AWAKE!" You know this voice, you remember it being the
most prominent from your dreams you had, the voice belongs to none other than
Sonic the Hedgehog.

You slowly turn over in his hand and look a his face, smiling down on you, "Hey guy,
remember me?" You freeze for a second and time seems to stand still. "What? Don't
you remember the times we had?" he asks. "I thought those were all dreams?"
"Nope! They were the one hundred percent real deal!" You think for a moment,
"If they were real then how can you explain my getting here?" you ask.
"I think you ask too many questions" Says sonic with a big grin on his face,
"But just know this, you're here, you're tiny, and I've been running around all day in
these old shoes of mine, that should be the first thing on your mind."

It was true, while you sat in Sonic's palm you could only think of what you did with
his feet, you even recall being plastered between his feet and Tails'.
Sonic then asks, "So, what do you want to do from here?"
132.title: The Blue Behemoth

choices: Ask Sonic to take off his socks
Bow, kiss and worship his socked feet
