The boy genius wasn’t making much sense. First off, what did he mean by an “experiment?” From what you recalled, Tails was just joking around with Silver when he previously mentioned the occurrence of any kind of tests. Was he just lying to Silver, in order to get the hedgehog off his back?

While that would certainly make a lot of sense, it didn’t explain why he thought you’d take any particular enjoyment in whatever it was he had planned. Besides that, didn’t he just meet you a few minutes ago? What would he know about what you did and didn’t like?

Without further debate, Tails reaches down and picks you up; thankfully, in his excitement, he didn’t carelessly wrap his stout fingers around your body hard enough to squeeze the life out of you. Instead, he’s just as gentle as he was before; after initially picking you up in his entire fist, he gingerly positions his other hand underneath you and deposits you on it. Now that you're safely standing on the platform of his palm, he takes off and flies around the bend. Even though his rotating tails were so high above you, the force of the wind raining down on you as he flew made it feel like you were stuck in the middle of a hurricane.

The whipping winds finally died down, punctuated by a deafening crash made by Tails’s shoes hitting the floor. Without the typhoon raging about you, you could finally open your eyes enough to see where you were.

The room had 3 large windows on each wall, giving you a near unbroken panoramic view of the sunlit, rolling fields outside. In fact, the windows were so massive that it felt like there weren’t even any walls in the room at all. Even the ceiling had an impressive sunroof, through which brilliant golden sunshine lit the room, far brighter than any single artificial light could.

The bedframe appeared to be sturdily made out of some thick logs of an unknown type of wood; though the mattress, pillows and sheets that covered them appeared downy soft. There was a thick comforter on the bed as well, quilted with large brown squares that alternated shades from one to the next.

Much to your surprise, other than the bed, the room didn’t appear to be furnished with anything else. There was no dresser to speak of, nor a television set or a closet. The only things you could see were two small nightstands flanking either side of the bed. On one nightstand, you noticed a picture; this one you could see clearly enough to recognize the smiling faces of Sonic and Tails, both boys slinging their arms around each other’s backs.

The boy genius must have noticed your astonishment, because as he put you down on the bed, he said. “Oh, yeah this is Sonic’s room, for when he stays the night and stuff. The bed’s big enough to fit both of us in here, so it’s the perfect spot for me and you to conduct the tests.” He then looks down at you and raises his eyebrows “Okay, don’t go anywhere. I’ll be right back.”

With that, the twin-tailed fox bounds out of the room; palpably giddy with some kind of mysterious excitement. You take another look around, and are taken aback by the sheer magnitude of the bed. You’d thought Silver’s bed was utterly massive, but when compared to this, it seemed rather puny. If you had to make the comparison, where Silver’s may have been a full sized bed, this one was a king.

Initially, you scoff at the greediness of the blue blur. Did he honestly need all this room to sleep? It all seemed rather excessive, even for him; though, when you think about it, you suppose he’d need the room if his massive ego were ever going to fit along with him.

But then another thought crossed your mind, as you looked upon the small picture on the nightstand again. Didn’t Tails use the phrase “us” when referring to who slept in this bed?

Before you could follow up on that line thought, you heard excitedly booming footfalls coming from behind you. You manage to turn just in time to see Tails enter the room again, his hands filled with all kinds of objects. He makes his way over to the bed, and throws down on it an enormous brown leather suitcase. On top of it balanced a familiar looking yellow tablet computer, which the boy immediate swiped up.

His fingers dance across the surface of the screen, and when he’s finally satisfied with whatever is displayed on it, he reaches into the tufts of his gloves and produces a collection of very small black dots. He shuffles over to you with them and says, “Okay, before we get to the good stuff, I gotta put these on you. They’ll allow me to get all kinds of readouts while the test is going on. Just hold still for me, okay little guy?”

You oblige, curious as to what exactly the young fox had in mind. You look on in great interest as Tails picks up the dots one at a time, gives the flat side of them a slobbery lick with his cute little tongue, and presses them into any bit of exposed skin he could find. After a few minutes, everything from your forehead to your feet was covered in small, black bumps. When you look down at your arms, you couldn’t help but think of ancient illustrations chronicling the effects of the medieval plague.

Once Tails was done admiring his handiwork, he takes the yellow tablet back into his hands and swipes its surface a few more times. His jubilant astonishment is hard to hide when he says, “Woah…your vital signs aren’t much different from normal sized people.” He looks up at you suddenly and flashes an embarrassed smile. “Oh, uh sorry, no offense.”

You brush it off, clearly understanding the boy’s intent. In truth, it was a fascinating discovery for you as well; though you also couldn’t say that you thought about it all that much, either. Still, it was promise that maybe you’d learn something from all this too, whatever THIS was.

Tails then turns a knob on pad, and a recognizable series of beeps gradually increases in volume. This must have been a heart monitor of some kind, a thought that was confirmed when Tails placed the pad down and you saw the endlessly scrolling jagged lines taking up a majority of the screen.

Once he places the pad down, he opens the suitcase next to him; from the angle at which you were standing, you couldn’t tell what was inside, but whatever it was, it didn’t make a sound as it was ruffled about by the boy genius. The minute or two of searching yields no clues as to the suitcase’s contents, and you can’t see what it is he produced when the search ends. All you COULD see was the fox boy bend down and disappear beyond the horizon of the bed for the span of a few minutes.

The whole time you heard a new series of rustling. Then, you heard a pop, and then another, followed again by more rustling. You take a few steps forward and try to crane your neck to see over the edge of the bed, but all you could see are the tips of the boy’s furry ears. Just when you're about to take a few more steps forward, his head pops back up again, giving you a terrific fright; which, in turn, causes the heart monitor to squeal in alarm for a few terrifying seconds.

He smiles at you and reaches for the pad. The steadily slowing beeps don’t cease as he minimizes the screen and opens up a brand new one. This new one is marked by a single, large microphone icon, which he taps with his finger. He doesn’t speak until a bright red circle surrounds the icon.

“Experiment number two five two zero one six: Codename Little Man will now commence. Subject’s vitals appear nominal up to this point…I will now begin with the control group.”

The boy flashes you a brief smile as he stands up and takes the pad in both hands again. He whips his tails up behind him and floats high into the air. Once they finally pass the rim of the bed, you realize that the boy isn’t wearing his iconic red and white sneakers anymore; you see instead a rather thick pair of pristinely white socks.

He floats over you, and his gigantic socked feet get ever closer. You can feel your heart rate increasing; each pulse punctuated by a shrill beep from Tails’s pad. When the boy finally plops down on the bed with a mighty quake, the towering beauties come to rest only a few steps away from you. They’re so close, you can feel the warmth radiate from them, causing a shiver to travel down your spine which is then announced by the beeping pad.

You’re frozen in place, unsure of what to do next. You look up at Tails for guidance; he has the back of the pad firmly trained on you, as if he was recording everything you did. He peeks over the edge of the pad and explains with a childish grin.

“Ya see little guy…Sonic told me all about how you had fun with his feet and stuff the last time you saw him. It got me really interested in what exactly makes feet attractive to somebody like you, so I designed this experiment in order to find out. Hopefully by the end of today, I’ll have enough data collected to be able to piece together an answer…in the meantime though, just do whatever you feel like to my feet. I want it to be completely natural, so make believe like I’m not here…well, I guess that would mean my feet weren’t here either…eh, you know what I mean.”

This had to be a dream…Tails was really okay with you doing whatever you wanted to his feet? Was he even old enough to understand what a fetish entailed…granted, he was a genius but he was still just a kid, right? You’re eyes unconsciously drift to the picture on the nightstand.

Well, maybe he had a bit more experience than you give him credit for. Either way, the boy was curious, and seeing as he was nice enough to loan his feet out to you, it’d be rude not to take him up on the offer, right?

The question is, where do you start?

1351122112211131212121121211121121121113.content:
The sound of whirring machinery jolts you from your slumber. For a fraction of a second, you could swear that you thought you were back in your old room, in your normal sized house amid your normal sized effects. However, your quickly sharpening vision promptly brings you back to reality.

Back to your strange, strange, STRANGE reality.

For seemingly miles around, spires of metal crowd the landscape like a city skyline. However, instead of buildings cast in steel and adorned with glimmering glass, you see nothing but enormous, complicated pieces of heavy machinery. Support struts, levers, cranks, cranes, gear boxes, transmissions, anti-gravity emitters; seemingly every conceivable piece of technology known, and sometimes UNKNOWN, to man is spread out before you in all directions.

You shift your hands beneath you in order to stand up. You notice that the floor is soft to the touch; upon further inspection, you realize that you had been sleeping on some folded, quilted rag roughly the size of a city block. Getting to your feet, you notice not but a few paces away a deep black stain the size of a pond. When you take a deep breath, the sharp stench of motor oil causes you to reel backwards and wince. Evidently, you find out, this rag wasn’t used solely as padding.

The resumed sound of whirring draws your attention to a particular section of the metallic tangle. You can see through a partially disassembled biplane engine enough to catch a glimpse of an orange and white shape flitting in the distance. You try to maneuver on your little patch of oil-stained, padded ground to get a better look, but the shape is just too far away and too massive to be seen clearly through the relatively small peephole.

Just as you resign yourself to a fate of sitting put and waiting, the whirring sound suddenly ceases, and you hear a loud clang in the direction of the orange object. Immediately after, the object shifts until the entire opening is filled with the image of a single, ocean blue eye. As soon as the eye catches sight of you it disappears upward.

Tails sets himself down in a clearing right in front of your makeshift bed. Much to your surprise, in spite of his absolutely IMMENSE size, he touches down with such grace that not even a light crunch leaves the sole of his shoes. He is wearing a big smile, which seems to only grow wider as he approaches. As he does, of course, his enormity only grows more and more apparent, and as if to drive the point home, each footstep shakes the ground with enough force to make your knees wobble.

Thank goodness you were used to this sort of thing. In fact, you were even ready for the inescapable feeling of feebleness that washed over you as Tails came to a stop a few steps away.

His booming voice brings your eyes back up, way up, to his face. Though he was now a towering beast compared to you, that child-like charm never seemed lost when you looked up into those innocent baby blues of his. Though, if recent events told you nothing else, Tails wasn’t as innocent as he had seemed.

But the seemingly endless hours of adult fun turned into a distant memory the instant he brandished that toothy, boyish of his at you. “Good morning little fella. Good to see you’re finally awake.”

Before you could automatically reply, you see him take a few steps over to your right. On a low, rolling shop chair adjacent to the workbench he had positioned you on was a small glass filled to the brim with a colorful liquid. Tails picked up the makeshift bowl and placed it gingerly in front of you.

“Here, it’s a sports drink. After all that exercise, you need to replenish your electrolytes.”

The boy smiles and gestures for you to take a sip. At almost the same time, an intense thirst hits you like a freight train. You heft the cup up and chug down the neon red colored liquid. As it passes your throat, you notice suddenly that the puffy cotton feeling in your mouth has instantly disappeared. In addition to that, a surge of energy forms in the pit of your belly and radiates out, coursing through your entire body and renewing your vitality. It feels as if you could run a marathon in this condition.

“he he he, you like my recipe? I like to add my own special blend of vitamins and minerals to give it that extra kick.”

He swings his leg back and forth sheepishly and rubs the back of his head as he says, “to be honest, I wasn’t totally sure if it would work on your unique physiology, but I’m glad to see that it does.” He wears another smile, and this time you can’t help but return it with one of your own.

“Well anyway, I’m glad you are feeling much better now. I wanted to thank you for taking part in my little…study. I got a LOT of useful data out of that.” He chuckles devilishly, knowingly, shaking you to the core with both excitement and nervousness.

In response to his thanks, you give an exaggerated bow, your way of telling him that he’s more then welcome. It seems that the gesture sparks something in him, as his eyes widen at that and he talks a bit more loudly then before.

“OH, THAT’S RIGHT!” Then, without another word, he puts a strange device up to his ear. You hadn’t realized he had been holding anything as he approached, but you realize in that moment that whatever it is must have been what he was working on so diligently as you were waking up. He clips the device to his ear with one hand and toggles a switch with the other. Then, with arms outstretched, he waits as the device buzzes and clicks it’s various components into place. A sharp, ultrasonic whine signals the end of the machine’s contortions.

After it fades into nothingness, Tails gestures to the device. “Pretty nice, huh? See, I might not have been able to make Silver that suit for you like I promised, but I figured I had to do SOMETHING for him. So, after you fell asleep and I got you situated, I thought up something that might be just as useful.”

Unexpectedly, he waves you on. “Go ahead little guy, say something.”

Perplexed and unsure totally of what he was getting it, you squint your eyes and study him carefully. When he didn’t laugh it off like a joke or offer any further explanation, you decide to finally give in and say something.

“Ummm, hello?”

No sooner had the words left your lips that Tails’ eyes grew wide. A smile formed, which soon grew into a full on beam. Eventually, he just couldn’t contain himself; he let out a cry of joy as he propelled himself quickly a few feet (for him, a couple STORIES for you) into the air.

In his excitement, he didn’t land quite as gracefully as he had before. The impact of his massive shoes hitting the concrete creates an earthquake for your tiny form that’s so powerful that it knocks you flat on your back. The sound isn’t anything to scoff at either, no different then a dozen thunderclaps going off in close proximity, or a controlled detonation to topple an old skyscraper.

As soon as he opens his eyes and quits shouting how well he did, Tails notices your plight and, quite embarrassingly, stops.

He shuffles uncomfortably and says, “Oh, um sorry little guy. I got a little…. carried away there.”

“Nah…it’s…. it’s cool. Don’t sweat it, man,” You manage to gasp out, carefully righting yourself and unplugging your hands from your ears. They begin to stop ringing as Tails smiles down at you and takes a few steps closer before kneeling down to make you muzzle level.

“Thanks little guy.” He giggles innocently, an expression you unbelievably still find cute even under the circumstances. But your mind quickly returns to the myriad of questions you have for the young genius.

“So, hold on here. You can understand me? How is that possible?”

The train of complex technical lexicon flies at you far faster then you could anticipate. Tails is just getting into a theory about quantum entanglement and it's effect on sound waves when you pipe up and stop him. “I’m sorry Tails, but….English, please?”

The boy froze mid sentence, and after pondering your response a moment said, “English? What’s tha…..ohhhh you mean you want it in laymen’s terms. Okay, well the basics of it is that this device amplifies your voice so anybody MY size can here you.” He smiles once more before adding, “Pretty neat, huh?”

You nod emphatically, too stunned by the possibilities to think clearly. You can’t believe this; after all this time, FINALLY you’re able to talk to someone normally. You don’t really know what to say, mostly because it had been so long since the last time anything you said actually MATTERED. You find that all you can do is what came naturally after all that time of being in total silence. You look Tails right in the eyes and bow a few times in thanks, but this time you actually voice your appreciation as well. The feeling of using the words from your lips to convey your emotions is absolutely indescribable.

“Thank you, thank you, thank you Tails. This means so much, you really have no idea.”

Another smile. “You’re welcome, friend.”

Just then, Tails looks past you at something. You turn around and notice that, out of the windows on the colossal hangar doors, the cheery blue sky has given way to the deep navy of night. You blink in surprise, shocked that you had slept for far longer than you anticipated.

Tails voices your thoughts before you have a chance too. “It’s getting pretty late. I’m supposed to take you home to Silver now.” The dissatisfaction on his face is infectious, and soon you find yourself wearing the same expression.

But just then, Tails seems to get an idea. “You know what though, if I needed you until late in order to make some ‘final calibrations to your suit,’ maybe he’d let you stay the night. What do you say, little guy? Wanna sleep over with me?”
1351122112211131212121121211121121121113.title: A Gift from a Friend

1351122112211131212121121211121121121113.content:
“I think it might be best if I stay here,” you said finally. “We can head back first thing in the morning.”

Tails smiles wide. Even though he was being polite, you could tell he is thrilled to be keeping you around for a little bit longer. That kind of attention is really rather nice, when you think about it.

“Okay! Sounds like a plan to me!” With that excited affirmation, he yawns loud enough to cause a pleasant hum to course through your body.

It wasn’t too long before he picks you up in his gargantuan, gloved hands and carries you out of his workshop and into his house proper. He carries you off to his room and places you gently on the foot of his bed. Looking intently at Tails, you see him unbuckling and pulling off his gleaming red sneakers. The boy glances up at you, grinning knowingly as he peels the footwear off. He does it as slow as possible, the sound of his sock stickily peeling away from the insole escaping the dark cavern inside and filling the room with bliss. Once it’s out in the open, his toes wiggle inside their cotton home: a home which, you notice, is marked with darker spots of delicious sweat. The marks are darkest near his wiggling toes, nearly outlining the slender, cheesy digits as they press up against the cotton with each movement.

“Now I can get the input right from the source. How do you like that little buddy?”

Even though you could technically give an answer, you find it difficult to find the words. Your breath is caught in your throat; drool oozing unknowingly as if you’re staring at a delicious meal right in front of you. In a manner of speaking, you somewhat are.

He peels his other shoe off and sets it down carefully next to him. Taking a seat on the floor, he stretches his legs towards the bed; they’re kept straight, the ankle puffs of his socks kissing, balls of his feet just barely meeting. If you were down there on the floor, it would be like two pillowy buildings planting themselves in front of you. You ogle the sexy features of the giant fox as he leans forward and touches those succulent toes with his fingertips. After a second of that, he moves on to yet another stretch, this time using one leg.

You can’t exactly tell if this stretching is part of his normal night routine or he was just putting on a show for you, but a show it certainly is. He’s surprisingly nimble for a young mechanic, owing probably to the many battles he has to fight in addition to all the engines he has to put together. You see his face melt with joy as joints pop all along his body. Admittedly, the sound is pretty relaxing, and even somewhat stimulating as it allows him to maximize his stretches.

Finishing with an impressive split,the boy stands with an effortless grace, taking a deep breath. He towers over you once again, looking down at you at his crotch level.

“I don’t know about you, but I’m absolutely exhausted. You can feel free to stay up and explore if you want, but there’s no way I’m going to be able to stay conscious for much longer. I’m pooped”

His twin tails spin rapidly for a few seconds, carrying him up and over you and gently depositing him on the bed. It’s so gentle that you don’t even feel it, even as he puts his full crushing weight down on it.

“Got any last words before I take my device off? I won’t be able to hear you when I do, remember. So speak now or forever hold your peace… until morning anyway.”

The cute giggle he produces warms your heart up right away. You smile up at him; then you glance down at his feet.

“Uh… just one request maybe…”

Tails glances down and giggles once again. “Oh those were coming off in a minute. Don’t you worry little fella. I’m WELL aware of how much you like my feet.”He pauses a moment. “Which actually, raises a really obvious question I should have asked to begin with.”

As he peels his reeking socks off his feet, he continues.

“Why are you so attracted to feet in the first place? I admit I was sort of guessing before when I brought out all those different socks to wear for you. I didn’t really know the first thing about what I was doing, other than you were responding well to it.”

Your eyes are transfixed on the the boy’s digits as he speaks, though you do offer a response.

“Well… it’s kind of hard to explain actually. I’ve just always been this way. The sight of feet really excite me.” You pause, then continue, “well, not JUST the sight I guess.”

“Oh?” Tails inquires, as he starts peeling the other one off. Their familiar cheddar scent begins wafting about the area with a new strength, almost as if they’re encouraging you to continue on.

“Yeah. The scent, the taste, the feel; ALL about them, basically. It’s sort of like… as if I’m interacting with a penis or a vagina, basically. It’s just natural for me.”

“Woah, the attraction is that intense? Is it like that for everyone where you’re from?”

“Uh… no, certainly not. In fact, it’s somewhat looked down upon by people who don’t share these feelings. I know I would keep it to myself around friends and family and stuff.”

“But not around us I suppose.” He giggle sweetly again, surrounding you with his soles. He doesn’t look like he’s up to anything mischievous; as a matter of fact, he seems to have them there more for your comfort and enjoyment than anything else. It’s very… loving, in a way.

Another long yawn leaves the fox boys lips.

“I wish I could chat more, but I’ll pass out if I don’t get some shut eye soon.”

“Heh, is my story boring you that much?”

Tails leans forward and gives you a friendly pet on the head, smiling.

“Goodnight you snarky little guy.”

“Goodnight Tails. Sweet dreams.”

You sit back and let the boy fiddle with his earpiece. He takes it out and places it on the night stand next to him. Smiling down at you one last time, he pulls the covers up over his body. Whether it’s that action or him putting his head to his pillow, the lights go out automatically without another peep or action from the genius lad. It very quickly puts the whole room into a comfortable, relaxing state; the light from the moon through the window is the only source of illumination, the sound of crickets and the gentle wind bringing an immediate sense of calm.

It’d be the ideal sleeping situation, if you were at all sleepy.

Tails’ concoction did a great job at waking you up, and right now you couldn’t think of shutting your eyes. Your slowly softening stiffy does give you an idea about how you can quickly exhaust all that extra energy, however…

You trek across the boy’s titanic topography, walking across the ebbs and flows of his blanket as you make your way up toward his face. You realize that he is on his side, as the path you walk is narrow and steadily rising as you reach his shoulders. The thick floor muffles your steps, preventing you from disturbing your gracious gigantic host.

You reach his face in no time. The boy must have been tired alright; he snores softly under you, his breath making little waves of fabric in his sheets sway back and forth like trees in the wind. Jumping down to that level, you smile as his unique-smelling breath washes over you. It’s comforting, and even tempting you to stop and enjoy it… but you have another prize in mind.

You make your way in the darkness of the sheets.It takes a minute for your eyes to get used to the darkness, but you’re following your nose far more at this point.Further and further in you go, making your way towards those smelly prizes.

And then, you pause a moment.

A thick, musky scent off to your side catches your attention. Moving towards it, you are quickly surprised when you walk directly into the soft flesh of Tail’s red rocket. Feeling around in the dark, and from what little you can perceive with your eyes, you can tell it’s already poking out very noticeably from its soft, furry home.

In fact, touching your face where you bumped into it, you feel the sticky, warm precum oozing its way between your fingers.

Between the scent and the feel of the precum, your body is sent into overdrive. You practically rip your clothes off and lunge yourself at the boy’s sex. Writhing, sweating, humping and kissing the rod makes it grow swifty, oozing out more of that clear, delicious goo.

It doesn’t matter if you can see it or not. It doesn’t even matter if you wake Tails up or not anymore. Your lust drives you absolutely wild; so much so that you wonder just exactly what was in that drink you partook in.

After a few minutes of savoring Tails’ strong, potent flavor, you feel his thick manhood start to pulse. The shaking rocks your body to the core, prompting your own prostate to start to tighten. You hump his knot vigorously, crying out his name into the darkness before blowing your load right on his smooth, silky skin.

Your head swims as you pump more and more semen out of your rod. Through the fog, you can just barely take in Tails’ monster cock unloading gallons and gallons of cum into the sheets in front of him. Whatever his true age is, this load was certainly not that of a mere child. The cum stain that forms is so massive and thick with sticky white love that you can’t help but bring your sweaty body over to it and lying down in its sticky, warm embrace. And it’s there, breathing in the fox-boy’s man musk, coated in your own jizz on the front and his on your back, that you finally fall into a deep, restful slumber once again.

"Good, I'll let my foot off if need be, but for now, let's take a look at the options you have foot-meat. For 1. Nod yes, for 2. Nod no. And if your wondering where foot licking is, like I said, if your a good boy we can get to that later got it?"

You nod.

"Good, 1. You can massage my other lonely foot while the other stays where it is and switch, and don't worry, the tape will come off your hands and arms, because I'm hoping you learned you can't get away. Only so you can do the massage while the other foot stays on your mouth. Or 2. You can kiss my feet passionately, both of them obviously, but you would still have to not speak and do it for a few hours. Your choice?"

Both options didn't sound very pleasing to you, either way, feet are going to be on your face, the smell still unbearable and still very wet and sweaty. Both incredibly embarrassing, maybe more comfort will come from option 1 due to more movement, while option 2 allows you to breath from your nose and mouth, very tricky choice.

"Well? I'm waiting...."

As he says this, much like fingers on tables, he starts wiggling his toes over your nose much like an irritated lady would her nails like she were tapping something. Silver wasn't going to let this though process go on for long. It became a tiny bit harder to breath as each time silvers toes pressed down onto his nose. He suddenly presses on your nose and mouth and squeezes hard not allowing you breath suddenly.

"I'm not going to wait all day!"

Nod yes for #1

Nod no for #2
1543111.title: ...for my feet to get some worship! But first...

choices: Silver wants you to lick his feet
15431112.content:
After analyzing the situation for a while and the fact that Silver was practically choking you, you quickly make a decision and nod no, at least your mouth will be free right? Thankfully he eases the pressure and allows you to breathe but he doesn't lift his foot off your mouth just yet.

Silver just looks down at you with that smug grin and chuckles "Awww, you're really eager to show your new gods how much you love them aren't you?" he asks with a mocking tone. He wiggles his toes in front of your nose and slightly presses them against it as he continues to speak "Well I can't blame you, I bet you just can't wait to have the best kiss of your life but don't forget your place!" his voice getting more firm at the end of the sentence. "Don't speak unless I let you and make sure you're kissing them passionately, they're your gods after all!" he presses down his foot a little harder for a second as if to make a point. "Got it foot-meat?'

You nod your head still scared by his earlier threat. "Good boy" he smirks before finally lifting his foot of your face and hoovers it above it just so you can get a good look at it, he lowers it slightly, that way his sole is almost touching your lips. "Go for it foot meat!"

You take a deep breath now that you can, it was mainly filled with the aroma of Silver sweaty feet but you were glad you were able to breathe freely. You decide based on your previous experience that it's better to not keep Silver waiting and you lean in and give his sole a peck, before you could lean in for another one Silver stomps on your face making you whimper. "I!... Said!... Passionately!..." Obviously not happy with your performance he even pushes his foot down harder when pronouncing every word. "You're way too low to be those beauties lover but when I tell you to kiss them like they're the love of your life you do so foot-meat, understand?!". You quickly nod your head and continue whimpering quietly. "Since I'm feeling merciful I'm gonna pretend that didn't happen and give you another chance, but if you kiss them as pitifully again I'm not gonna be so generous!" he finally lifts up his foot again and lets it rest above your mouth. "Again!"

This time you immediately go for the kiss, trying to fix your mistake, you press your lips against his sole you close your eyes before letting your mouth be invaded by the salty taste of Silver's foot sweat and dirt. You suck on the foot and push your tongue against it during the kiss. Finally after solid minute you break the kiss. Fearing that you did a bad job again you keep your eyes shut afraid of getting smothered by his foot again but instead you hear him say "There, that wasn't so hard was it?" he then brings his other foot above your head and presses it's heel on your mouth "Looks like they like you" he says and then begins to lightly grind his heel on your lips. "You better keep kissing foot-meat, and how about telling my feet you love them before continuing huh?" he asks while holding back laughter. "Come on now!" too afraid to disobey you look at feet above you and mutter "I l-love you" with your mouth full of Silver's heel, Silver bursts out laughing but you not wanting to disappoint him just start making out with his heel, once again getting mouthful of sweat and dirt and treating his foot as if it was your lover.

He keeps giving you different areas of his feet to kiss while mocking you with devilish grin, but you keep on going. This goes on for a while but Silver seems to enjoy taking his time with the undersides of his toes, finding it hilarious to see you struggle with the smell and sweat, he also tries keeping the foot that's not being kissed busy by rubbing it all over your face or by cupping your nose with his toes and making you inhale his foot fumes. At one point he lifts his foot up playfully, that way it's just out of your reach and chuckles "Come on foot-meat, get it, get it" he says mockingly as you lift your head as high as you can trying to kiss it, he keeps swaying his foot above you and wiggling his toes while laughing at you and treating you like a dog that can't reach his treat. After having a ball looking at your pathetic attempts to reach his foot he finally lowers his big toe letting you kiss it and sliding it all over your lips as you greedily slobber all over that sweaty toe.

After a while he finally seems satisfied "Enough foot-meat", you stop your worshipful kisses at the command, he then rests both of his feet on your face and wiggles his toes "Your gods took a liking to you, they definitely gonna enjoy owning you" he says as he taps his toes on your forehead. "Inhale deeply foot-meat" he commands and you instantly take deep breaths of his sweaty feet, it was still making you a little dizzy but you definitely got used to it to say the least. Silver thinks what to do with you next as he looks down at you with a smug grin across his face while you're huffing his foot scent.
15431112.title: No: Kiss silvers feet (passionately)

choices: I think I'll keep you as a foot slave!"
15432.content:
You realized you were in somebody's house. It wasn't the neatest place and it seemed quite dark. Then you suddenly heard someone chuckling. "Well well... It looks like some intruder thought it was smart to break into my home", as you looked at the source of the voice your eyes met the one and only Scourge the Hedgehog! You now realized how bad the situation looks.

"Oh no no, I didn't break in here" you tried to reason with the hedgehog, but he just keeps coming at you, then he pushes you to the ground "In all honesty, I don't care how you got here and why you're here" He smiles as he presses his booted foot on your chest. "All I care about is that you're here, you're not going anywhere and we can have some fun!" He said with a smirk, tapping his foot on your chest few times. You can only hope his kind of "fun" doesn't involve any harm. "Well...
15432.title: Scourge

154331.content: You're asleep at Angel Island next to the legendary Master Emerald when you feel a gentle hand running across your belly. You burst into giggles and wake up. "Hello! Good to see your awake!" A cute voice was heard. When you look, you notice Tikal in her trademark outfit without her sandals. "Hi Tikal!" She gave you warm smile. She decided to start a conversation with you saying...
154331.title: Tikal

choices: The next day(Skip the back story and move on)
1543311.content:
You laugh a little at her statement before saying “Yeah, but there’s one thing ya should know Tikal.” “What’s that?” she asks curious. “Those who tickle me better expect me to fight back!” Her eyes widen in shock as the realization hits her “Oh no, don’t you dare!” she protests trying to avoid an “enjoyable” punishment. Her cries fall on deaf ears however as you bring your fingers towards her ribs and begin your assault “Hehehehe Cut it out!” says Tikal going into a giggling fit. You continue your assault switching from tickling her ribs to her stomach & navel until you get to her weakest link, her feet. After only going at her feet for about 30 seconds she’s already crying you a river, after about a minute you let her catch her breath.

“You. Are Evil.” She says laughing between each word, you chuckle a bit. “Ya think I’m bad? Just be happy it was me doing this and not my little brother Jack.” She raises an eyebrow at this and asks, “Why is that?” “If it were Jack and not me, he would have gone straight for your “weak link” and would have kept at it for about 2 hours.” Her face goes slightly pale as she lets out the words “Oh, my!” in a quiet voice.

You sigh a bit as you grab a hold the locket around your neck and open it looking at a picture inside said locket. Tikal notices your sudden mood change, “Something wrong?” “Oh, it’s nothing Tikal. Just thinking about an old friend from long ago.” You say as you bring the locket over to her and show her the picture inside of it.

The picture shows you at about the age of 6 or 7 standing next to you is a little bandicoot girl who looks about the same age as you. On the other side of you is another little boy who (if Tikal had to guess) is probably your little brother. Behind you are an older man and woman who are obviously your parents. Behind the little bandicoot girl stood two slightly older male ones most likely her brothers. All 7 of you are standing together smiling at the camera.

“That little girl in the picture is your old friend from long ago, I’m guessing?” Tikal asks handing back the locket, you just nod your head yes. She then asks “What’s she like?” you sigh and say “You might want to get comfortable, it’s a long story.” She does as you ask as you begin your tale.
1543311.title: Fun time with a friend

15433111.content: "The young Bandicoot's name is Coco. We've been childhood friends since we were both 7. We had such a fun time together! Racing, Sharing her laptop, Hugging, and tickling. But one day, my family got evicted so we had to leave. I never saw her again." You start crying and Tikal cries on your shoulder. "That's horrible!" She says with pure sorrow. While crying, something happens.
15433111.title: Back story leads to crossover

154331112.content:
As you finish your story you notice a bright glow coming from the master emerald and a portal appearing above it, you go in too shock as you immediately recognize the mask that comes out of it. "No way, it's you!" to Tikal's surprise the mask starts talking "It's been years hasn't old friend, but I must ask, why did you leave?" you sigh as Tikal taps you on the shoulder and asks "Who is this?" "Oh right, Tikal this mask is known as Akuaku he's the guardian of the wumpa islands the bandicoot family's home."

"Now, back to Aku's question, at first I thought it was because we were banished from the island but the real reason was that I have a demon sealed within me & my parents both knew it, so until I could get that power inside of me under control we had to leave because we didn't want to risk putting you all in danger & if he got out when I had no control the world would have been destroyed.

"So that explains why you disappeared. But I'm afraid we have an even greater problem." You interrupt him and say "Let me guess Cortex is back and crash can't beat him alone?" you surmise, Akuaku just nods his head in confirmation, confirming you suspicions. Tikal suddenly speaks get both of your attention, "Then what are you 2 doing here then?! Go help the bandicoots and quickly!" She says leaving no room for argument. 'Yes ma'am!" you say chuckling as you give her a mock salute. She chuckles as well before placing a hand on your shoulder and says "I guess this is Farwell for now." she says giving you a small smile you give her one of your own and say "Yeah, I guess but I'll make sure to visit you. Ok?" She just nods her head and gives you one last hug before letting you go. you turn your head towards Akuaku and give a small nod answering his unspoken question. Without another word there's a flash of light as you and Akuaku are warped away to the battle happening on the wumpa islands.
154331112.title: reunion with an old friend

choices: Now that Cortex is gone, Reunion time!
1543311121.content:
As you regain your sight you notice your on the wumpa islands. "Okay, now we need to figure out how to help Crash." before you can say anything there's a sudden shout for help fallowed by a loud roar presumably from Tiny. Without thinking you run towards the source of the shout and find Tiny holding Coco by the neck. "Hey Tiny, have some yarn!" you say as you grab a ball of yarn out of your pocket and throw it. Tiny lets out a shout of "Yarn!" before letting go of Coco and does what any cat would do when yarn is involved. You look over at Akuaku and say "Stay with Coco, let me know when she regains consciousness." "What are you going to do?" Akuaku asks you look over your shoulder and say "I'm going to awaken the beast." you say with a growl as smoke starts rising from your fingertips.

As you go over towards Crash you let out a chuckle and say "surprised?" he lets out a laugh before saying "Very, mind helping me out with him?" he asks pointing over his shoulder towards Cortex Whose in too much of a shock from your reappearance to do anything and is completely unprepared for a few seconds before saying "Well, well, it's been too long my little lab rat." "I never WAS & never WILL be your lab rat!!" you shout in rage as your body is engulfed in orange flames, your skin burns away transforming you into a skeleton and a red scythe appears on the right side of your back. "Alright Cortex you stole two things from me, now I want them back!!" you say as a chain appears in your hand and you swing it at him it lands and pulls out two orbs one shining light blue with fire around it, the other a much darker shade of blue with lightning coming out of it.

As you hold both orbs in your palms you shout "With these I shall finally be whole again!!!" as you break the light blue orb the left side of your body gets engulfed in blue flame and a scythe of the same color appears on the left side of your back. Cortex's face visibly pales as he says "What demon have I created!?" terror and horror filling his voice. Cortex then does what any person would do in this situation, panic and run away like a coward.
1543311121.title: Awakening the beast

choices: Completely destroyed (it must have gotten real banged up in the battle)
Still intact (They must be really lucky)
15433111211.content:
(A/N Forgot to add the bit about the second orb being broken in the last chapter but to put it simply the protagonist has control over lightning)

As Cortex runs off the flames ware out and your body returns to normal Crash runs over towards you and asks "Who or what was that?!" with wide eyes. You sigh in exasperation before saying "I'll have Akuaku explain ounce Crunch & Coco regain consciousness." he just nods his head in confirmation before his eyes widen in shock as he remembers something "Oh crud, Crunch!" Crash shouts going over to where Crunch is you fallowing right behind him.

As soon as the two of you reach Crunch you see he's in the position that a ostrich is when it hides. As you and Crash grab hold of Crunch's arms Crash says "Hold on bro, we'll get ya outta there!" it seems he heard it cause after the sentence leaves Crash's mouth Crunch calms down and lets the two of you handle getting him free, with a few strong tugs your able to get him free. He lets out a grunt as he gets up then he does a double take when he spots you, he looks at you in shock & disbelief before saying "Dude, it's been too long!" you let out a chuckle, "You don't know the half of it man."

The three of you start hearing footsteps coming towards you as a voice shouts "Crash, Crunch!" you don't even have to look to recognize who that was. The three of you turn in the direction of the voice and see Coco running towards you Akuaku close behind, She stops dead in her tracks as soon as she sees you, "Hey babe miss me?" you ask with a small smile. She doesn't respond instead she runs at you wraps her arms around your neck before starting to cry, "You have no idea how long I waited for the day you would return." She says tears falling out of her eyes as she rests her head on your shoulder. You bring her into a warm embrace as you rub her back to calm her down, "I know Coco, I know. But now I'm back and I'll always be with you I promise you that." As you let go of her you look over at the bandicoot's home and find that it's...
15433111211.title: Rekindling an old friendship

choices: Or switch over to Coco & the others
154331112111.content:
You can only look in shock at what used to be the bandicoot's home or what's left of it. You look over at the bandicoots and see Crash clenching his fists as he walks off to vent & you could've sworn you saw some smoke rise off of his fingers as well as his eyes go black with blood red pupils in them. Your taken out of your moment of shock as Coco suddenly says "Look at our home..." She says as tears well up in her eyes, '..it's completely destroyed, There's no way we can repair it!" She says before going over to you and begins to cry again.

You rub her back for a little while to get her to calm down as well as offer to let her & her brothers to stay with you & your family after a few minutes she calms down and just gives you a small nod seeing no reason to argue with you about your offer, after all your offering her and her brothers a new home. As she lets go of you you look off in the distance at Cortex's blimp just floating over the ocean as if it were trying to mock you.

You turn back towards Coco as a look of seriousness crosses your face and say "I swear to you Coco, that DAMN BASTERD of a scientist must have a death wish 'cause he's dug his own FUCKING grave!!!" you say as you punch your palm which causes your powers to activate on reflex which causes Coco to freak out saying "What the HECK was that!!" You mentally kick yourself you forgot that the bandicoot's don't know about your powers, You sigh a bit as the rest of the bandicoot's and Akuaku come back, you ask Akuaku to explain what you told him involving your disappearance.

(A few minutes later)

As Akuaku finishes explaining the reason behind your disappearance you finish telling your family about what's going on with the bandicoot's now your just waiting on your mom to get here with a boat, eventually she arrives you tell them you'll meet up with them at your place later, "'Kay." your mom replies before speeding off towards home.

As soon as they're far enough away you whistle for your bike as your powers activate, you look over your shoulder at Akuaku saying "Let's go, we've got some "business" that needs to be done." to which he says "Right." before the both of you speed off toward Angel island.
154331112111.title: The Scars of battle

choices: You get to the parking lot & meet up with them when they finish up
You get there but they still have shopping to do
1543311121111.content:
You bring your bike to a stop at the island's bridge and get off deactivating your powers in the process, as you go up the steps leading to the master emerald and as you thought Tikal is there praying as always "Hey Tikal." you say causing Tikal to jump a bit, She turns around and breathes a sigh of relief before saying "Oh, it's just you, Don't scare me like that!" she says giggling you do as well before saying "Sorry, anyway I'm sure ya already know what happened with the bandicoot's & the reason why I'm here."

She nods her head and says "I watched everything thanks to the master emerald, As for why your here: Akuaku needs a new sanctuary because his old one got destroyed in the battle and you were planing to have him stay here so he'll be safe. Am I right?" you just nod your head saying "Bingo, Now if you don't mind I'd better get going." Tikal interrupts you saying "Let me guess, the bandicoot's are with your mom and she's taking them clothes shopping." you chuckle before saying "Right again, now I got to go." you say as you snap your fingers & warp over to your bike and ignite the flames ounce again before speeding off.
1543311121111.title: Stay with you & Akuaku

choices: Cut to when you all get home & are having supper
Something happens on the way(Reader's choice)
15433111211111.content:
You bring your bike to a stop as you get to the parking lot and head in to meet up with the others, you see them see them siting at one of the food court tables. "Hey, Nice new outfits guys!" you say as you join them at their table and look the bandicoot's over. Coco's new outfit consists of a tank top and a pair of denim shorts and sandals, Crash's outfit consists of a new pair of jeans, muscle shirt and sandals & Crunch's outfit is almost the same just with cameo pants instead of jeans. "Thanks." they reply sheepishly, "So, who picked out what?" you ask to which your mom states "The boys picked theirs out & I helped Coco with hers."

"Okay..." you trail off as you unknowingly start staring at Coco & she does the same for a few seconds before Crash starts waving a hand in your faces saying "Hello, earth to lovebirds." which immediately gets a reaction out of both of you "We're NOT lovebirds!" both of you shout simultaneously as you both blush causing Crash and Crunch to burst out laughing and your pretty sure you saw your mom trying to hold back from laughing but failing horribly.

"Real funny bro, real funny." Coco says with a small pout, Crash now in control of his laughing fit says "Sorry sis, Couldn't resist." before wiping a tear out of his eye,
"Anyway." you say as you clear your throat, "Does this stuff look familiar to any of you three?" you ask the bandicoot's as you pull out a test tube with some sort of whitish green blood in it.

Their reactions are instantaneous as each of them visibly pale, "T-that's!" Crunch exclaims not able to finish his sentence, "Carbonite." Coco states shaking as if saying that word will destroy the world. "Carbon!" Crash says with an almost feral growl as his eyes go black with red pupils ounce again, "Where DID you FIND this?!" Crash suddenly asks wanting answers. "I found it on Angel Island in the forest about a week before I reappeared on your island." you say, stating the truth.

"Now answer me this, Just WHO is Carbon & WHAT did he do to piss you off this much!" you say wanting answers of your own. Crash sighs a bit before saying "Carbon is my twin, my twin brother he used to help us out in our adventures but Cortex messed with his mind now he works for him. As for why I hate him, he hit on my old girlfriend Tawna." Crash sighs again before saying "I don't believe it." before walking off to vent. You look over at everyone else and say "We'd better go calm him down & head home, sense it's so late." everyone nods their heads as Coco gets up to tag along with you to go calm Crash down.
15433111211111.title: Foreboding news

choices: The girls get a devious idea
154331112111112.content: While everyone was on the way home, a bunch of Chao surrounded them happily. "Aww they're so cuuuuute!" Coco squealed happily. All of a sudden, Tikal dropped in annoucing that they were having a welcoming party. Once everyone got back, you wanted to speak with Tikal and Coco. The conversation went smoothly but when it was finished...
154331112111112.title: An unexpected party

choices: Something wakes you in the middle of the night
1543311121111122.content:
"Well, well, A party & we weren't invited?" a voice rings out from up in the sky startling all of you. you all look up and see the man you hate to the core, Cortex floating on a hover craft but he's not alone on two other hover crafts stand three people Carbon on one & pinstripe with Tawna in his arms unconscious on the other.

"How DARE you show your face to us after the crime you committed!" you shout getting ready for a fight until to your surprise Cortex holds his hands out in peace "Now, now dear little nephew calm down, I come baring gifts." "What do you mean gifts?" you say suspicious of what Cortex might do. "For you my nephew & Coco a power crystal." he says as he pulls a power crystal out of his coat and tosses it at you, he continues "And for the others take Carbon and Tawna." He finishes as he pushes a button a remote he had with him which causes the mind control collier on Carbon's neck to come off before he starts falling toward the ground, luckily Crunch reacts fast enough to catch him before he gets seriously hurt. After which pinstripe picks the still unconscious Twana up over his head and shouts these words: "Enjoy your girl crash, I have no interest in her now!" he shouts before he flings her at Crash who just barely catches her in his arms.

Pinstripe decides to leave while Cortex stays around for a moment and says "Crash, the reason why I'm reuniting you with your brother is because he's regaining his memory and because of that he's of no use to me anymore.." he trails off not saying anything more as he warps away.

"I don't know about you guys but I'm beat." you say with a yawn as bandicoot's nod in agreement with you. Afterwards you all say your goodbyes to Tikal & the chao and head home to go to bed. (Crash has a guest bedroom with Twana, Crunch has his own guest bedroom, Carbon's asleep on the couch and You & Coco are sleeping in your room which of course is the only option she would have picked ) (picture Crash with white fur and green tattoos instead of his normal orange and purple now ya know how carbon looks)
1543311121111122.title: Cortex interrupts

15433111211111222.content: A curious Chao goes up to you and starts tickling you. You giggle until the tickling wakes you up. "Hey little guy." you say with a tired look. Tikal walks in saying, "A few of the Chao love tickling, they're all female too. So how would you like to have a whole day of ticklish fun with me, the Chao, and Coco without any interruptions?" You nod lightly. "Alright. Hey, you think we could keep one?" Tikal replies, "Of course you can." After thinking of a name, you decide. "I'll call her Miku." "Cute name!" She said happily. Everyone was getting tired so Tikal and the Chao decide to sleep with you and Coco in sleeping bags.
15433111211111222.title: Something wakes you in the middle of the night

154331112111112221.content:
You wake up the next morning at about 7:45 careful to not wake Coco & the others, you decide to head out to the back porch to watch the sun come up & to your surprise Crash is already out here doing exactly what you planed to do "Morning Crash." you say as you sit at the table across from him. "Morning, my brother." he says as you both bump fists, he then says "two questions: 1. what are you doing up so early and 2. Who's this?" he asks referring to Miku Coco's new pet chao.

"Well, to answer the first question I always get up at this time to watch the sun come up, as for the second, This chao is Miku Coco's new pet, as for how she got her Tikal came here last night don't ask why she'll explain later." he just nods his head knowing all this will be explained in time.

You sigh a bit as you look crash in the eye and say "Can I ask you something?" he nods his head and says "Shoot." before you continue "Have you ever had any moments where it feels like your in a different mindset when your pissed off at someone or something, like if your real angry & it feels like you being lit on fire in a sense?" he raises an eyebrow at this and says "Yeah, twice why?" you nod your head quietly before saying "I saw your eyes change color and smoke rising off your fingers, the first time was when your home was destroyed, the second was when Carbon was mentioned at the mall." he nods his head and says "What color were my eyes exactly?" you sigh and say "Completely black with blood red pupils." you notice his mood get serious before you continue "Look Crash the reason why I'm asking these questions is for one reason." "And that is?" he asks with a raised eyebrow, "To put it bluntly Crash, I think based on what I've seen I know for an absolute fact that you have a ghost rider inside of you." How does Crash react to this news?
154331112111112221.title: Getting Answers

choices: Tikal's tickling day plan has begun(Coco's getting tickled)
1543311121111122212.content:
Crash just raises an eyebrow at this statement and says "Heh, who knew?" before shrugging his shoulders "Wow I partway expected ya to freak the heck out, then again you've been in crazier situations." Crash chuckles a bit at this saying "Yeah, I do have one question though, Why do I have these powers?" You give him a small smile before saying "Simple, the ghost rider power can't be given out to just anyone there's only 2 ways that I know a person can get these powers: 1. you get them for your own destiny in the future, or 2. you get them from your bloodline. For my case it's because my dad passed them down to me so that's an example of a bloodline, As for your case destiny must have something big planed for you." you finish with a chuckle as Crash takes a moment to get all of that in his head.

"I'm guessing that the powers require a lot of intense training to unlock them won't they?" he asks with a groan, "Right you are my brother, you & I both will be training to help you unlock those powers As for the trainer, he's a bit hot headed." "Who is he?" "The very demon that created those powers in the first place: Hades The demon king." as soon as that sentence leaves your mouth Crash notices that the world it's self went still and quiet before you continue "His training will be brutal, my dad will take us there early tomorrow, no one can know about this not even Coco." you say as you get up to head back into the house crash fallowing right behind you, When you get back in to the house you find..
1543311121111122212.title: He reacts surprisingly calmly

15433111211111222122.content: Tikal put everything into motion. While Coco was asleep, she tied the bandicoot down on the bed. A few minutes later, she woke up. Tikal expected a shocked reaction from Coco. However, she knew what was coming and actually got excited. The orange echidna giggled cutely. "I think I'll let you choose the first spot Coco." Coco took a few seconds before she could decide. She chose her...
15433111211111222122.title: Plan in motion

choices: cut to when Tikal gives Coco a break & meets Jack for the 1st time
154331112111112221221.content:
Tikal giggles a bit at her response saying "Ya want to get this done quick huh? That's understandable, "cause it's super early right now." "Get on with it." Coco says growing impatient. Tikal stifles a laugh before pulling out a small whistle and says "Alright Chaos, time for some fun." before blowing into it. As if on cue all the chao in the room spring upward and fly in front of their guardian. "Okay, ready.." she trails off as she snaps her fingers & almost like magic the chao now have feathers.

"..Tickle attack!" Tikal finishes as the chao bolt towards the tied up bandicoot and begin to tickle her belly, "Oh, gosh!" Coco says before going into a laughing fit. info.brief_description:
In memorial of Sonic Feet 2007 - 2013
A story about Sonic and co.'s feet!
info.description:
Welcome to my reboot!
Some brief info: Sonic Feet was an interactive story (Erotica) based on Sonic Characters (Mostly Male)
and their feet. It was an interactive that I visited frequently and was devastated to find it removed, so I
started my own Sonic Feet to try to recapture what I loved about the original.

Please keep all entries to 2nd person and present tense: "You rub Sonic's feet"

It's come to my attention recently that I should have tried to illustrate more about what I want/ Don't want in the story so: Here it goes

I will allow mostly anything, it's what made the original special and it would be easier to say what I don't want to see.

I do not want:
1. A name for the main character: I don't hate First or Third Person, I just prefer "You" to "I" or a name, ambiguity is fun!
2. Extreme grammatical errors (I will edit as I see fit)
3. Death (Unless there is a way to write the character back to life)
4. Hardcore scat and gore.
5. I will allow crossovers, but that doesn't mean you can just not include a Sonic Character, this is primarily a Sonic interactive. So if you do do a crossover the story-line must contain at least one sonic character.
6. Also, under no circumstance (baring previous chapters so far) Do I want a stream of question chapters. Period. End of story. I know of too many stories that have potential but are over bearing on question chapters. One here and there is fine, but if you must make a chapter that asks essentially "Who is it?" Make the chapter more than one sentence.

If there is anyone who would like to add to this ever expanding story, but you aren't confident in your writing,
or if you would like to see something specific and don't want to write it yourself I am more than willing to help,
Always feel free to send me an email.

I would love to be more active here once again, so please do not hesitate to ask!
I'm here to help satisfy your footy needs (Or whatever other fetishes/ stories you have in mind)
